sw: Akijumuika na mkurugenzi mkuu wa shirika la afya Duniani (WHO), Dk.Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus na Dk. Joel Phaahla, waziri wa afya na waziri wa biashara na viwanda, Bw. Ebrahim Patel wa Afrika Kusini pamoja na maafisa wa ngazi za juu kutoka nchi zinazofadhili mkutano wa kipekee ulikagua maendeleo tangu WHO na Medicines Patent Pool (MPP) ilipozinduliwa mwezi Juni 2021.
yo: Olùdarí Àpapọ̀ Àjọ Elétò Ìlera Àgbáyé (WHO), Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus àti Dr Joe Phaahla, Mínísítà fún Ètò Ìlera àti Mínísítà fún Kátà-kárà àti Ilé-iṣẹ́, Mr Ebrahim Patel ti orílẹ̀-èdè South Africa papọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ onípele-gíga láti àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tí wọ́n ń pèsè owó ni wọ́n darapọ̀ mọ́ wọn, ìpàdé aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ yìí ṣe àtúnyẹ́wò ìlọsíwájú láti ìgbà tí WHO àti Medicine Patent Pool (MPP) ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ rẹ̀ ní oṣù Òkudù ní ọdún 2021.
zu: Ukujoyinwa iNhlangano yeZempilo eMhlabeni (WHO) uMqondisi Jikelele uDkt Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus noDkt Joe Phaahla uNgqongqoshe weZempilo noNgqongqoshe Wezimboni nokuhweba uMnumzane Ebrahim waseNingizimu Afrika ndawonye nezikhulu ezisezingeni eliphezulu eziphuma emazweni axhasile, lomhlangano owehlukile ubheke ukuqhubeka kusukela ukwethula kweWHO neMedicines Patent Pool (MPP) ngoNhlangulana 2021.

am: "ዝቅተኛ እና መካከለኛ ገቢ ላላቸው ሀገራት የክትባት እና የሌሎች ህይወት አድን የጤና ምርቶችን ፍትሃዊ ተደራሽነት ለመስጠት ኤም.አር.ኤን.ኤ(mRNA) ቴክኖሎጂ ሽግግር ዘላቂ ሞዴል ለመደገፍ ከአጋሮቻችን ጋር በኬፕ ታውን በመገኘቴ ደስተኛ ነኝ" ሲሉ የዓለም ጤና ድርጅት ዋና ዳይሬክተር ዶክተር ቴድሮስ አድሃኖም ገብረእየሱስ ገልፀዋል ።
en: “I am delighted to be here in Cape Town with our partners to support a sustainable model for mRNA technology transfer to give low- and middle-income countries equitable access to vaccines and other lifesaving health products,” said WHO Director-General Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus.
ha: Na yi farin cikin kasancewa a nan Cape Town tare da abokan haɗin guiwa na samar da shiri mai ɗorewa na Kamfanin Musayar Fasaha ta mRNA domin tallafawa ƙasashe masu ƙaramin ƙarfi wajen samun rigafi da sauran magunguna inganta lafiya kamar kowa; a cewar darakta-janar na Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya, Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus.
sw: Nina furaha kuwa hapa Cape Town na washirika wetu kusaidia mtindo endelevu wa uhamishaji wa Teknolojia ya mRNA ili kuzipa nchi za kipato cha chini na cha kati fursa sawa ya kupata chanjo na bidhaaa nyingine za kuokoa maisha", alisema mkurugenzi mkuu wa WHO, Dk Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus.
yo: Inú mi dùn láti wà ní Cape Town níbi pẹ̀lú àwọn alájọṣepọ̀ wa láti ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún àwòṣe alálòpẹ́ fún ìfiránṣẹ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ mRNA láti fún àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tí ìpawówọlé wọn kéré àti agbede-méjì ní ànfààní adọ́gba sí àwọn àjẹsára àti àwọn ohun èlò ìlera adóólà-ẹ̀mí mìíràn," Olùdarí-Àpapọ̀ WHO Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus ló sọ bẹ́ẹ̀.
zu: "Ngiyajabula ukuba lapha eKapa kanye nababambisani bethu ukuzokweseka imodeli egcinekayo yokudluliselwa kobuchwepheshe mRNA ukunikeza amazwe anemali engenayo encane kuya kwephakathi nendawo ukuthola ngokulingana umgomo kanye neminye imikhiqizo yezempilo esindisa izimpilo zabantu," kusho uMqondisi Jikelele weWHO, uDkt Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus.

am: "በዚህ ፕሮጀክት ውስጥ በተሳተፉት ሁሉ ስኬት በጣም ኮርቻለሁ; ሁለት ዓመት ባልሞላ ጊዜ ውስጥ ተባብረን ስንሠራ በጋራ እንደሚሳካልንም አሳይተናል።
en: “I am immensely proud of the achievement of all those involved in this project; in less than two years we have shown that when we work collaboratively, we succeed collectively.”
ha: Ina alfahari da duk waɗanda suka ba da gudunmuwa a wannan aiki wajen samun nasara cikin abin da bai wuce shekara biyu ba wanda hakan ke tabbatar da cewa idan aka yi aiki bakiɗaya, za mu samu nasara tare.
sw: "Ninajivunia sana mafanikio ya wale wote waliohusika katika mradi huu; kwa chini ya miaka miwili tumeonyesha kuwa tunapofanya kazi kwa ushirikiano, tunafanikiwa kwa pamoja"
yo: "Ìwúrí ńlá gidi gan-an ni àṣeyọrí gbogbo àwọn tí wọ́n lọ́wọ́ sí iṣẹ́-àkànṣe yìí jẹ́ fún mi; ní nǹkan bí ọdún méjì dín a ti fi hàn pé a lè jọ ṣiṣẹ́ papọ̀, a ṣe àṣeyọrí lápapọ̀."
zu: "Ngijabule kakhulu ngokuzuziwe kubona bonke ababambe iqhaza kulephrojekthi,ngaphansi kweminyaka emibili sesikhombisile ukuthi uma sisebenza ngokubambisana, siphumelela sonke."

am: የስብሰባው ተሳታፊዎች በፕሮግራሙ ውስጥ ከ 15 አገሮች የተውጣጡ የባዮማኑፋክቸሪንግ አጋሮችን፣ ዋና ባለሙያዎችን፣ ኢንዱስትሪዎችን፣ የሲቪል ማህበረሰብ ተወካዮች እና የገንዘብ ሰጪዎችን ያካትታሉ።
en: The meeting participants include biomanufacturing partners from 15 countries in the Programme, leading experts, industry, civil society representatives, and funders.
ha: taron ya haɗa da masu haɗin guiwa daga kamfanin kimiyya daga ƙasashe 15 da ke cikin shirin, da ƙwararru da masana'antu da wakilan al'umma da masu zuba hannun jari.
sw: Washiriki wa mkutano ni pamoja na washirika wa utengenezaji wa viumbe hai kutoka nchi 15 katika mpango, wataalamu wakuu, viwanda, wawakilishi wa mashirika ya kiraia, na wafadhili.
yo: Àwọn tí wọ́n kópa nínú ìpàdé náà ni àwọn alájọṣepọ̀ tí wọ́n ń ṣe ìpèsè ajẹmọ́-ìbí láti orílẹ̀-èdè 15 nínú ètò náà, àwọn akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ tó ń léwájú, ilé-iṣẹ́, àwọn aṣojú ẹgbẹ́ àwùjọ, àti àwọn olùpèsè owó.
zu: Ababambiqhaza bomhlangano kufaka ababambisani bomkhiqizo wasemazweni angu-15 oHlelweni, ongoti abaphambili, imboni abameli bomphakathi kanye nabaxhasimali.

am: በአምስት ቀናቱ ስብሰባ ውስጥ፣ ተሳታፊዎች ያሳዩትን እድገት ያጋራሉ እና ለፕሮግራሙ ዘላቂነት እንደ የአእምሮአዊ ንብረት ጉዳዮች እና የቁጥጥር ጉዳዮች እንዲሁም ስለ ኤም.አር.ኤን.ኤ(mRNA) ቴክኖሎጂዎች ሳይንስ እና በሌሎች የበሽታ አካባቢዎች ከኤል.ኤም.አይ.ሲዎች(LMICs) ጋር ተዛማጅነት ያላቸውን እንደ ኤች አይ ቪ እና ቲዩበርክሎዝስ ቁልፍ መተግበሪያዎች ላይ ይወያያሉ ።
en: During the five-day meeting, participants will share progress and discuss critical enablers for the sustainability of the Programme such as intellectual property issues and regulatory aspects, as well as the science of mRNA technologies and key applications relevant to LMICs in other disease areas such as HIV and tuberculosis.
ha: Ana sa ran a yayin wannan taro na kwanaki biyar, mahalarta taron za su yi musayar hanyoyin samar da cigaba ɗorawar shirin kamar batu na haƙƙin mallaka da dokokin gudanarwa da fasahar mRNA da muhimman hanyoyin LMICs da suka shafi wasu cututtuka kamar cuta mai karya garkuwar jiki da kuma tarin fuka.
sw: Wakati wa mkutano wa siku tano, washiriki watashiriki maendeleo na kujadili viwezeshaji muhimu vya uendelevu wa mpango kama vile masuala ya mali miliki na vipengele vya udhibiti, vilevile sayansi ya teknolojia ya mRNA na matumizi muhimu yanayohusiana na LMICs katika maeneo mengine ya ugonjwa kama vile VVU na kifua kikuu.
yo: Ní àkókò ìpàdé ọlọ́jọ́-márùn náà, àwọn akópa máa sọ nípa ìlọsíwájú wọn ó sì jíròrò lórí àwọn aṣokùnfà pàtàkì fún ìtẹ̀síwájú Ètò náà bíi àwọn ìṣòro ohun-ìní ọlọgbọ́n àti àwọn tó jẹ́ ti òfin, bákan náà ni sáyẹ́nsì fún ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ mRNA àti àwọn ìṣàmúlò pàtàkì tó níṣe pẹ̀lú LMICs ní agbègbè àwọn ààrùn mìíràn bíi KASA àti ikọ́fe.
zu: Ngesikhathi somhlangano wezinsuku esinhlanu, ababambiqhaza bazokwabelana ngokuqhubeka baxoxe ngokubucayi kwezinto zokugcineka koHlelo njengezinkinga zegunyabunikazi nezindlela zokulawula kanyenesayensi yezobuchwepheshe be-mRNA nokusebenza okubalulekile okuhlobene neLMIC kwezinye izndawo zezifo njengeHIV nesifo sofuba.

am: የኮቪድ-19 ወረርሽኝ፣ በጤና ምርቶች በተለይም በክትባቶች ተደራሽነት ላይ ከፍተኛ ኢፍትሃዊነት እንዳለ አመልክቷል።
en: The COVID-19 pandemic has underscored that gross inequity exists in access to health products, especially vaccines.
ha: Annobar Kwabid-19 ta yi matuƙar fallasa mummunan rashin daidaito na neman lafiya, musamman game da rigakafi.
sw: Janga la UVIKo-19 limesisitiza kuwa ukosefu wa usawa upo katika upatikanaji wa bidha za afya, hususani chanjo.
yo: Àjàkálẹ̀ ààrùn COVID-19 náà ti fi hàn pé àìdọ́gba tó pọ̀ wà nínú ànfààní sí àwọn ohun èlò ìlera, pàápàá jùlọ àwọn àjẹsára.
zu: Ubhubhane lweCOVID-19 sekukale ngaphansi ukuthi ukungalingani okuphelele kukhona ekutholeni imikhiqizo yezempilo, ikakhulukazi imigomo.

am: እ.ኤ.አ ከመጋቢት 2023 ጀምሮ፣ የአለም ጤና ድርጅት ኮቪድ-19ን የአለም አቀፍ ስጋት የህዝብ ጤና ድንገተኛ አደጋ (PHEIC) ካወጀ ከሶስት አመታት በኋላ፣ 69.7 በመቶ የሚሆነው የአለም ህዝብ ቢያንስ አንድ የ ኮቪድ-19 ክትባት ወስደዋል።
en: As of March 2023, more than three years after WHO declared COVID-19 a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC), 69.7% of the global population had received at least one dose of a COVID-19 vaccine.
ha: Tun bayan ayyana Kwabid-19 a matsayin lamarin da ya shafi lafiya da ke buƙata kulawar gaggawa a duniya a watan Maris ɗin 2023, kawo 69.7 cikin ɗari na al'umma ne a faɗin duniya suka kai ga samun aƙalla ƙunshi ɗaya na rigakafin Kwabid-19.
sw: Kufikia Machi 2023, zaidi ya miaka mitatu baada ya WHO kutangaza UVIKO-19 kwa dharura ya afya ya umma ya wasiwasi wa kimataifa (PHEIC), 69.7% ya watu Duniani walikuwa wamepokea angalau Dozi moja ya chanjo ya UVIKo-19.
yo: Títí di oṣù Èrenà ọdún 2023, ọdún mẹ́ta lé lẹ́yìn tí WHO kéde COVID-19 gẹ́gẹ́ bíi Pàjáwírì Ìlera Àwùjọ fún Ẹ̀dun Ọkàn Ilẹ̀-òkèèrè (PHEIC), 69.7% àwọn ènìyàn lágbàyé ti gba ó kéré jù oògùn àjẹsára COVID-19 kan.
zu: Kusukela ngoNdasa 2023, ngaphezu kweminyaka emithathu ngemva kokuthi Iwho imemezele iCOVID-19 njengePublic Health of International Concern (PHEIC), u-69.7% wesibalo sabantu emhlabeni sebethole okungenani idosi eyodwa yomgomo weCOVID-19.

am: በተለይም ይህ መጠን አሁንም ዝቅተኛ ገቢ ባላቸው አገሮች (LICs) ከ 30 በመቶ በታች እንደሆነ ነው።
en: Notably, this proportion still remains below 30% in low-income countries (LICs) .
ha: Abin lura shi ne kaso 30% na wancan adadi sun fito ne daga ƙasashe masu ƙaramin ƙarfi (LICs).
sw: Hasa, sehemu hii bado inasalia chini ya 30% katika nchi zenye kipato cha chini (LICs).
yo: Pàtàkì jùlọ, ìpín yìí ṣì wà lábẹ́ 30% ní àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tí ìpawówọlé wọn kéré (LCIs).
zu: Okuqaphelekayo lengxenye izohlala ingaphansi kuka-30% emazweni anemali engenayo encane (amaLIC).

am: ይህ ፕሮግራም፣ ከኤል.ኤም.አይ.ሲዎች(LMICs) ዘላቂ የማምረት አቅም ስርጭትን በማሳደግ፣ ክልላዊ እና ክልላዊ ትብብሮችን በማጎልበት እና በተበጀ እና ሁሉን አቀፍ ስልጠና እና የባለሙያዎች ድጋፍ የሀገር ውስጥ የሰው ሃይል በማዳበር እና በማብቃት ኤም.አር.ኤን.ኤ(mRNA) ክትባቶችን ፍትሃዊ ተጠቃሚ ለማድረግ የበኩሉን አስተዋፅኦ ማድረግ ነው።
en: This Programme aims to contribute to equitable access to mRNA vaccines by increasing the distribution of sustainable manufacturing capacity across LMICs, enhancing regional and inter-regional collaborations, and developing and empowering a local workforce through tailored and inclusive training and expert support.
ha: Manufar wannan shiri shi ne ba da gudunmawa ta baiɗaya wajen samun rigakafin nRNA ta hanyar ninƙa samar da rigakafin a tsakankanin LMICs da ƙarfafa haɗin guiwa a tsakanin yanki da sauran yankuna da bunƙasawa da ƙarfafa wa masu aiki na ƙasa ta hanyar ba su horo da tallafi.
sw: Mpango huu unalenga kuchangia upatikanaji sawa wa chanjo za mRNA kwa kuongeza usambazaji wa uwezo endelevu wa utengenezaji katika LMICs, kuimarisha ushirikiano wa kikanda na baina ya kanda, na kuendeleza na kuwezesha wafanyakazi wa ndani kupitia mafunzo yaliyowekwa na kuja kujumuisha na usaidizi wa kitaalamu.
yo: Ètò yìí gbèrò láti ṣe àfikún sí ànfààní adọ́gba sí àjẹsára mRNA pẹ̀lú ṣíṣe àfikún sí pínpín ìkápá ìpèsè alálòpẹ́ jákèjádò LMICs, ṣíṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún àjọṣepọ̀ ní ẹkùn agbègbè àti ẹlẹ́kùnjẹkùn, àti ṣíṣe àgbékalẹ̀ àti Ìrónilágbára fún àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ lábẹ́lé nípasẹ ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àkànṣe àti aláfibọ̀ àti ìrànlọ́wọ́ àwọn akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́.
zu: Loli Hlelo luhlose ukuxhasa ekutholeno okulinganayo emigomweni ye-mRNA ngokunyusa ukuhambisa kwamandla okukhiqiza okugcinekayo kuwona wonke amaLMIC, ukwandisa okwesifunda nokubambisana kwaphakathi nezifunda nokudevelopha nokusiza ukusebenza kwasendaweni ngokwenziwa kokuqeqeshwa nokwesekwa ngongoti.

am: በ ኤም.አር.ኤን.ኤ(mRNA) ቴክኖሎጂ ማስተላለፊያ ሞዴል ውስጥ ልዩ የሆነው ቴክኖሎጂዎችን ለብዙ ተቀባዮች ማጋራት የሚፈቅደው በአገር ውስጥ እና በክልላዊ ምርት እርዳታ የሚያስፈልጋቸውን በፍጥነት እንዲደርሱ የሚያስችል ሁለገብ ሂደት ነው።
en: What is unique in the mRNA Technology Transfer model is the multilateral process that allows sharing of technologies to multiple recipients so that through local and regional production those in need can be reached rapidly.
ha: Abin burgewa game da Tsarin Musayar Fasaha shi ne tsarin sanya kowa cikin samun damar musayar fasaha ga mutane daban-daban wajen iya samar da rigakafin domin isa ga masu buƙata cikin sauri.
sw: Kipi cha kipekee katika kielelezo cha uhamisho wa Teknolojia ya mRNA ni mchakato wa kimataifa unaoruhusu ugavi wa Teknolojia kwa wapokeaji wengi ili kupitia uzalishaji wa ndani na kikanda wale wanaohiotaji waweze kufikiwa kwa haraka.
yo: Nǹkan tó dá yátọ̀ nínú Àwòṣe Ìfiránṣẹ́ Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ mRNA ni ìgbésẹ̀ oríṣiríṣi tí yóò fi ààyè sílẹ̀ fún pínpín àwọn ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ fún oríṣiríṣi àwọn tí yóò gbà á kí ó ba lè dé ọ̀dọ àwọn tó nílò rẹ̀ nípasẹ àwọn ìpèsè lábẹ́lé àti ẹkùn agbègbè kíákíá.
zu: Yikuphi okwehlukile kumodeli yoKudluliselwa kweZobuchwepheshe kwe-mRNA kuhlelo olunezinto eziningi oluvumela ukwabelana ngobuchwepheshe,ukuthola okuningi ukuze ukukhiqizwa ngokwesifunda nendawo kulabo abadingayo kungafinyelela ngokuphindiwe.

am: የደቡብ አፍሪካ የጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስትር ዶ/ር ፋህላ “ዛሬ ታሪካዊ ወቅት ነው፤ ይህ መርሃ ግብር ዝቅተኛ እና መካከለኛ ገቢ ያላቸዎን ሃገራት በአለምአቀፍ የትብብር ትስስር ለማጎልበት ያለመ ነው” ብለዋል።
en: Dr Phaahla, Minister of Health South Africa, said: “What we see here today, is a moment in history, a Programme that is aimed at empowering LMICs through a global collaborative network.
ha: A cewar dakta Phaahla, ministan Lafiya na Afirka ta Kudu; abin da muke gani a yau abu ne na tarihi, shiri ne da manufarsa karfafa wa LMICs da ke faɗin Duniya ta hanyar haɗin guiwa.
sw: Dk Phaahla, waziri wa afya wa Afrika Kusini, alisema : "Tunachokiona hapa leo, ni wakati katika historia, mpango ambao unalenga kuwezesha LMICs kupitia mtandao wa ushirikiano wa kimataifa.
yo: Dr Phaahla, Mínísítà fún Ètò Ìlera ní orílẹ̀-èdè South Africa, sọ wí pé: "Nǹkan tí a rí níbi lónì, jẹ́ àkókò kan nínú ìtàn, Ètò kan tí wọ́n gbèrò láti ró àwọn LMIC lágbára nípasẹ ojú òpó àjọṣepọ̀ àgbáyé.
zu: UDkt Phaahla, uNgqongqoshe weZempilo eNingizimu Afrika, uthe: "Esikubona namhlanje lapha,umzumzu womlando, uHlelo oluhlose ukusiza iLMIC ngohlelokuxhumana lokubambisana emhlabeni.

am: በአንፃራዊ ሁኔታ በአጭር ጊዜ ውስጥ የተገኘውን እድገት በማየቴ በጣም ደስተኛ ነኝ እና - እንደ ደቡብ አፍሪካ ያሉ ጠንካራ የባዮማኑፋክቸሪንግ አቅም ያላቸው እና በጋራ ለመስራት ፣ አንዱ ከሌላው ለመማር እና ለማካፈል ፈቃደኛ የሆኑ፣ ከተለያዩ ሀገራት የሚደረገውን ድጋፍ በደስታ ተቀብያለሁ።"
en: I am thrilled to see the progress made in such a relatively short time and welcome the support from so many different countries - countries like South Africa that have a strong vibrant biomanufacturing capacity and that are willing to work together, learn from and share with each other.”
ha: Na yi matuƙar farin cikin ganin cigaban da aka samu a ƙankanin lokaci tare da yin maraba da tallafi da aka samu daga ƙasashe da dama kamar Afirka ta Kudu da ke da Kanfanin Kimiyyar Halittu da kuma ƙoƙarinta na ganin ta koya tare da musayar ilimi a kowa.
sw: Nimefurahi kuona maendeleo yaliyofikiwa kwa muda mfupi na nakaribisha msaada kutoka kwa nchi nyingi tofauti- nchi kama Afrika Kusini ambazo zina uwezo mkubwa wa kutengeneza viumbe na ambazo ziko tayari kufanya kazi pamoja, kujifunza kutoka na kushiriki na kila mmoja".
yo: Inú mi dùn láti rí ìtẹ̀síwájú tí ó ti di ṣíṣe láàrín àkókò díẹ̀ mo sì gba àtìlẹ́yìn láti ọ̀dọ ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè lóríṣiríṣi - àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè bíi South Africa tí ó ní ìkápá ìpèsè ajẹmọ́-ìbí tó ń ṣiṣẹ́ dáadáa tó sì lágbára tí wọ́n sì ti ṣetán láti ṣiṣẹ́ papọ̀, kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ láti ọ̀dọ ara wọn kí wọ́n sì tún sọ ọ́ fún ará wọn."
zu: Ngiyajabula ukubona inqubekela phambili eyenziwe esikhathini esifishane kangaka, siyakwamukela ukwesekwa okusuka emazweni amaningi ahlukene-amazwe afana neNingizimu Afrika anokukhiqizwa okuqinile anamandla, futhi sizimisele ukusebenza ndawonye, ukufunda nokwabelana kuthina sonke."

am: የከፍተኛ ትምህርት እና ሳይንስ ሚኒስትር ብሌድ ንዚማንዴ ፣ "እኛ የያዝነው ከኮቪድ-19 ባለፈ ኤም.አር.ኤን.ኤ(mRNA) ቴክኖሎጂ ማስተላለፊያ ማዕከል ራዕይ ነው።
en: Minister Blade Nzimande of Higher Education and Science, said: “Ours is the vision of the mRNA Technology Transfer Hub beyond just COVID-19.
ha: a cewar ministan Ilimi Mai Zurfi da Kimiyya, Blade Nzimande, mafarkinmu game da Shirin Musayar Fasaha ta mRNA shi ne ta zarce batun Kwabid-19 kaɗai.
sw: Waziri Blade Nzimande wa Elimu ya juu na Sayansi, alisema: "Letu ni dira ya mRNA Technology Transfer Hub zaidi ya UVIKo-19.
yo: Mínísítà Blade Nzimande fún Ètò-ẹ̀kọ́ Ilé-ìwé Gíga àti Ìmọ̀ Sáyẹ́nsì, sọ wí pé: Tiwa ni àfojúsùn Ibùdó Ìfiránṣẹ́ Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ mRNA tayọ COVID-19 nìkan.
zu: Ungqongqoshe Blade Nzimande weMfundo ePhakeme neSayensi, uthe: "Umbono wethu weHabhu yoKudlulisela ubuchwepheshe be-mRNA kungaphezu kweCOVID-19 nje.

am: የምንገነባው ችሎታዎች ሌሎች ወደፊት ወረርሽኞችን ለመቋቋም የሚያስችል ኃይልን ለመስጠት ያለመ ሲሆን፣ ክትባታቸውም በተመሳሳይ ኤም.አር.ኤን.ኤ(mRNA)ን የቴክኖሎጂ መድረክ ሊጠቀም ይችላል።
en: The capabilities we are building are looking to empower us to deal with other future pandemics whose vaccines could use the same mRNA technology platform.
ha: Muna ƙoƙarin samar da yanayi ne da zai ba mu dama a nan gaba mu iya fuskantar kowacce annoba ta hanyar samar da rigakafinta daga fasahar mRNA.
sw: Uwezo tunaojenga unatazamia kutupa ili kukabiliana na magonjwa mengine baadae ambayo chanjo zake zinaweza kutumia jukwaa la Teknolojia la mRNA.
yo: Àwọn ìkápá tí à ń ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ rẹ̀ ń wá láti ró wa lágbára láti kojú àwọn àjàkálẹ̀ ààrùn ọjọ́ iwájú mìíràn tí àjẹsára wọn ò lè lo àwọn ìkànnì ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ mRNA kan náà.
zu: Amandla okuthi siyakha afuna usizo kuthina ukubhekana nobhubhane lwesikhathi esizayo imigomo yalo engasebenzisa inkundla efanayo yobuchwepheshe be-mRNA.

am: በአካባቢያችን እየተስፋፉ ያሉ እንደ ወባ፣ ሳንባ ነቀርሳ፣ ኤችአይቪ እና ኤድስ ባሉ በሽታዎች ላይም ዓይኑን ያሳረፈ ራዕይ ነው።
en: It is a vision that has set its eyes on diseases that are prevalent in our environments such as Malaria, Tuberculosis and HIV and AIDS.”
ha: Wannan hangen nesa ne da aka yi kan cututtukan da suka zama gama-gari ga al'ummarmu kamar maleriya da tarin fuka da cuta mai karya garkuwar jiki (HIV da AIDS).
sw: Ni Dira ambayo imeweka macho yake kuhusu magonjwa ambayo yameenea katika mazingira yetu kama vile Malaria, kifua kikuu na VVU na UKIMWI"
yo: Ó jẹ́ àfojúsùn kan tí ó fi tẹjú rẹ̀ mọ́ àwọn ààrùn tí wọ́n wọ́pọ̀ ní àwọn agbègbè wa bíi àìsàn ibà, ikọ́fe àti KASA."
zu: Kungumbono osubeke amehlo awo ekubhekaneni nezifo ezivamile ezindaweni zethu njengoMalaleveva, isifo sofuba, iHIV ne-AIDS."

am: ይህ አጋጣሚ ዶ/ር ቴድሮስ እና ዶ/ር ማትሺዲሶ ሞኢቲ የዓለም ጤና ድርጅት እና የአፍሪካ ክልላዊ ዳይሬክተር ቻርለስ ጎሬ የኤምፒፒ ዋና ዳይሬክተር እና በአፍሪገን ሪባን የመቁረጥ ሥነ ሥርዓት ላይ የተሳተፉት የተከበሩ ሚኒስትሮች በተገኙበት አፍሪገን የሚገኘውን ኤም.አር.ኤን.ኤ(mRNA) ቴክኖሎጂ ሃብ ተቋም በኬፕ ታውን መከፈቱ ለፕሮግራሙ ጠቃሚ ምዕራፍ ነው፣ ።
en: This occasion also marks an important milestone for the Programme with the inauguration of the mRNA technology Hub facility at Afrigen in Cape Town in the presence of Dr. Tedros and Dr. Matshidiso Moeti WHO Regional Director for Africa, Charles Gore Executive Director of MPP and the Honorable Ministers who took part in a ribbon cutting ceremony at Afrigen.
ha: Haka kuma wannan taro ya fito da muhimmancin shirin da aka ƙaddamar na Fasahar mRNA da aka yi a Afrigen da ke Cape Town a idon Dakta Tedros da Dakta Matshidiso Moeti wanda darakta ne na Yankin Afirka a Majalisar Ɗinkin Duniya da Charles Gore, babban darkta na MPP da kuma ministoci waɗanda suka sa hannu wajen yanka ribon na bikin kaddamarwar.
sw: Hafla hii pia inaashiria hatua muhimu kwa mpango kwa kuzinduliwa kwa kituo cha teknolojia ya mRNA Hub huko Afrigen huko Cap Town mbele ya Dk. Tedros na Dk. Matshidiso Moeti Mkurugenzi wa WHO kanda ya Afrika, Charles Gore Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa MPP na Waheshimiwa Mawaziri walishiriki katika hafla ya kukata utepe huko Afrigen.
yo: Ìjókòó náà tún sààmì àṣeyọrí pàtàkì fún ètò náà pẹ̀lú ìfilọ́lẹ̀ Ilé Ìwòsàn Ibùdó Ìfiránṣẹ́ Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ mRNA ní Afrigen ní Cape Town ní ojú Dr Tedros àti Dr Matshidoso Moeti Olùdarí Ẹkùn Agbègbè WHO fún Ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀, Charles Gore Olùdarí Aláṣẹ fún MPP àti Ọ̀narébù Mínísítà tí ó kópa nínú ayẹyẹ gígé ríbínì ní Afrigen.
zu: Lomcimbi uphinde umake uhambo olubalulekile loHlelo nokwethulwa kwendawo yeHabhu yobuchwepheshe ne-mRNA e-Afrigen eKapa kukhona uDkt Tedros noDkt Matshidiso Moeti weWHO Regional Director for Afrika, Charles Gore uMqondisi oMkhulu weMPP kanye noNgqongqoshe abahlonishwayo ababamba iqhaza ekusikweni kweribhini emcimbini e-Afrigen.

am: የአፍሪገን ዋና ዳይሬክተር ፕሮፌሰር ፔትሮ ቴርባንቼ እንዳሉት፡ “መላው የአፍሪጀን ቡድን ኤም.አር.ኤን.ኤ(mRNA) ቴክኖሎጅ መድረክ ተጠናቆ ወደዚህ ወሳኝ ምዕራፍ በመድረሳቸው በጣም ተደስተዋል።
en: Professor Petro Terblanche, Executive Director of Afrigen said: “The entire Afrigen team are thrilled to reach this important milestone with the completion of the mRNA technology platform.
ha: Babban Darkta na Afrigen, farfesa Petro Terblanche cewa ya yi, ɗaukacin ma'aikatan Afrigen sun yi farin ciki na cimma wannan gagarumin mataki na kammala tsarin shirin Fasahar mRNA.
sw: Profesa Petro Terblanche, mkurugenzi mtendaji wa Afrigen alisema: "Timu nzima ya Afrigen ina furaha kufikia hatua hii muhimu kwa kukamilika kwa jukwaa la Teknolojia ya mRNA.
yo: Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Petro Terblanche, Olùdarí Aláṣẹ fún Afrigen sọ wí pé: "Inú gbogbo ikọ̀ Afrigen dùn láti ṣe àṣeyọrí pàtàkì yìí pẹ̀lú píparí ìkànnì ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ mRNA náà.
zu: USolwazi Petro Terblance, uMqondisi oMkhulu we-Afrigen, uthe: "Iqembu lonke le-Afrigen liyajabula ukufika kulokhu okubalulekile nokuqedwa kwenkundla yezobuchwepheshe be-mRNA.

am: ይህ መድረክ ከጫፍ እስከ ጫፍ ባለው ኤም.አር.ኤን.ኤ(mRNA) ክትባት ልማት እና የማምረቻ ተቋም ውስጥ የሚገኝ ሲሆን ኤም.አር.ኤን.ኤ(mRNA) ሀብ ኮቪድ 19 ክትባት እጩ አፍሪቫክ 2121 በአሁኑ ጊዜ በማሳደግ ደረጃ ላይ ይገኛል።
en: This platform is housed within the end-to-end mRNA vaccine development and production facility where the mRNA Hub Covid 19 vaccine candidate AfriVac 2121 is currently in scale-up phase.
ha: wannan wuri yana ɗauke da kayayyakin samar da rigakafin mRNA na Kwabid-19 samfurin AfriVac 2121 wanda ake matakin dab da kammala haɗa shi.
sw: Jukwaa hili liko ndani ya kituo cha kutengeneza chanjo ya mwisho hadi mwisho ya mRNA ambapo mtahiniwa wa chanjo ya mRNA Hub Covid 19 AfriVac 2121 kwa sasa yuko katika hatua ya kuongeza.
yo: Ìkànnì yìí wà nínú ìdàgbàsókè àjẹsára mRNA láti ìbẹ̀rẹ̀-dé-òpin àti ìpèsè ilé ìwòsàn níbi tí àwọn olùdíje Ibùdó mRNA àjẹsára COVID-19 AfriVac 2121 ti wà ní abala ìfẹ̀lójú.
zu: Lenkundla inendawo ekupheleni kokuthuthukiswa komgomo mRNA nokukhiqizwa kwendawo lapho ihabhu ye-mRNA yomgomo weCOVID-19 ikhandidethi AfriVac 2121 njengamanje isezingeni lesikalo esiphezulu.

am: ባለፉት 18 ወራት ውስጥ አፍሪገን በዚህ ፕሮግራም በነቃ የአጋሮች እና የአማካሪዎች ኔትወርክ ድጋፍ የማይታመን ለውጥ አድርጓል።
en: Over the last 18 months, Afrigen has undergone an incredible transformation with the support of a network of partners and mentors enabled by this Programme.
ha: Sama da watanni 18 Afrigen ke samun cigaba ta hanyar tallafi daga masu haɗin guiwa da mashawarta na wannan shiri.
sw: Katika kipindi cha miezi 18 iliyopita, Afrigen imepitia mabadiliko ya ajabu kwa usaidizi wa mtandao wa washirika na washauri wanaowezeshwa na mpango huu.
yo: Láti bíi oṣù 18 sẹ́yìn, Afrigen ti la àyípadà tó lápẹẹrẹ kọjá pẹ̀lú àtìlẹyìn ojú òpó àwọn alájọṣepọ̀ àti àwọn olùbánidámọ́ràn tí Ètò yìí fi ààyè gbà.
zu: Ngaphezu kwezinyanga ezingu-18 Afrigen isihambe uguquko olukhulu ngokwesekwa kohlelokuxhumana lababambisani nabeluleki abenza loluHlelo.

am: የ ኤም.አር.ኤን.ኤ(mRNA) ክትባቶችን ለማምረት በ ከኤል.ኤም.አይ.ሲዎች(LMICs) ውስጥ ዘላቂ አቅም የመገንባት ዓላማን በማገልገል ከፍተኛ የጥራት ደረጃዎችን ለማሟላት አቅማችንን እና ብቃታቸወንን አሳድገናል።
en: We have grown our capability and capacity to meet the highest quality standards of mRNA vaccine development, serving the objective to build sustainable capacity in LMICs to produce mRNA vaccines”.
ha: Ƙoƙarinmu na ƙaruwa domin kai wa ga ƙolokuwar mataki na inganci na rigakafin mRNA wanda ginshiƙi ga LMICs mai ɗorewa wajen samar da rigakafin mRNA.
sw: Tumekuza uwezo wetu na uwezo wa kufikia viwango vya ubora wa juu zaidi vya ukuzaji wa chanjo ya mRNA, ikitumikia lengo la kujenga uwezo endelevu katika LMICs kuzalisha chanjo za mRNA".
yo: A ti fi kún ìkápá àti ìkáátò wa láti dọ́gba pẹ̀lú àwọn òdiwọ̀n ojúlówó tó ga jùlọ fún àgbékalẹ̀ àjẹsára mRNA, tí ó ń ṣiṣẹ́ fún èròngbà láti ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ìkápá alálòpẹ́ nínú LMICs láti pèsè àwọn àjẹsára mRNA ".
zu: Sesikhulise amandla ethu nokukwazi ukuhlangabezana nezinga elihle eliphezulu lokuthuthukiswa komgomo we-mRNA, ukusiza injongo yokwakha ukukwazi okugcinekile kumaLMIC ukukhiqiza imigomo ye-mRNA.".

am: አፍሪገን የኮቪድ-19 ክትባት ማምረቻ ሂደትን በላብራቶሪ ደረጃ በተሳካ ሁኔታ አቋቁሞ በአሁኑ ጊዜ ያን ሂደት በደረጃ I/2 ክሊኒካዊ ሙከራዎች ወደ ጂኤምፒ(GMP) ደረጃ ለመጠቀም የክትባት ስብስቦችን ለማምረት ተስማሚ ደረጃ ላይ ይገኛል።
en: Afrigen has successfully established a COVID-19 vaccine manufacturing process at a laboratory scale and is currently scaling up that process to a level suitable for manufacturing vaccine batches to be used in Phase I/ II clinical trials to GMP standards.
ha: Afrigen ta samu nasarar samar da ɗakin gwajin rigakafin Kwabid-19 kuma a yanzu tare da samar da ingantattun ƙananan cibiyoyin samar da rigakafin da za a yi amfani da su a mataki na I da na II na gwaji domin kai wa ga ingancin GMP.
sw: Afrigen imefanikiwa kuimarisha mchakato wa kutengeneza chanjo ya UVIKO-19 kwa kiwango cha maabara na kwa sasa inaongeza mchakato huo hadi kufikia kiwango kinachofaa kwa utengenezaji makundi ya chanjo zitakazo tumika katika majaribio ya matibabu ya awamu ya I/II.
yo: Afrigen ti ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ìlànà ìpèsè àjẹsára COVID-19 ní àṣeyọrí pẹ̀lú òdiwọn ààyè fún ìmọ̀ ìjìnlẹ̀ tí ó sì ń ṣe ìfẹ̀lójú ìlànà yẹn dé ìpele tí ó ṣe é lò fún ìgbà pípẹ́ fún ìpèsè àwọn abala àjẹsára tí yóò jẹ́ lílo nínú Abala I/II àyẹ̀wò ajẹmọ́-ìtọ́jú sí àwọn òdiwọ̀n GMP.
zu: I-Afrigen isisungulwe ngempumelelo uhlelo lokukhiqizwa kwemigomo yeCOVID-19 ngesikalo selebhu njengamanje kuyanyuka uhlelo ngezinga elifanele lokukhiqiza ngezigaba imigomo ukuthi isetshenziswe ngesigaba sesibili noma sokuqala sokuhlola kwezokwelapha kumazinga eGMP.

am: በትይዩ ሂደት፣ አፍሪገን የስልጠና እና የቴክኖሎጂ ሽግግርን ለኔትወርክ አጋሮች ማከናወኑን ይቀጥላል።
en: In a parallel process, Afrigen will continue to carry out training and technology transfer to the network partners.
ha: Ban da wannan, Afrigen za ta cigaba da ba da horaswa da musayar fasaha ga 'yan abokan haɗin guiwarsu.
sw: Katika mchakato sambamba, Afrigen itaendelea kutekeleza mafunzo na uhamisho wa Teknolojia kwa washirika wa mtandao.
yo: Ní ìlànà adọ́gba, Afrigen máa tẹ̀síwájú láti ṣe ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti ìfiránṣẹ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ fún àwọn alájọṣepọ̀ ojú òpó náà.
zu: Kuhlelo oluhambisanayo, i-Afrigen izoqhubeka nokwenza ukuqeqesha nokudlulisela ezobuchwepheshe kubabambisani bohlelokuxhumana.

am: የገንዘብ አቅራቢዎቹ ፕሮግራሙን በጠቅላላ በ 117 ሚሊዮን ዩኤስ ዶላር በመደገፍ ወሳኝ ሚና ይጫወታሉ እናም ፈረንሳይ ኤም.አር.ኤን.ኤ(mRNA) ቴክኖሎጂ ሽግግር ስራ የመጀመሪያዋ ነች።
en: The funders play a crucial role in supporting the Programme with total funding to date at US$ 117 million and France being the first to fund the mRNA technology transfer work.
ha: Msu ba da tallafi sun taka muhimmiyar rawa wajen taimaka wa shirin da tallafin da ya kai Dala 117 zuwa yanzu kuma Faransa ce ta farko wajen fara ba da tallafin ga shirin musayar na mRNA.
sw: Wafadhili wanajua jukumu muhimu katika kusaidia mpango wa ufadhili wa jumla hadi sasa wa Dola za kimarekani milioni 117 na Ufaransa ikiwa ya kwanza kufadhili kazi ya uhamishaji wa Teknolojia ya mRNA.
yo: Àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ náà kó ipa pàtàkì nínú ṣíṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún Ètò náà pẹ̀lú ìpèsè owó lápapọ̀ títí di òní ní US$ 177 mílíọ̀nù tí orílẹ̀-èdè France sì jẹ́ àkọ́kọ́ láti pèsè owó fún iṣẹ́ ìfiránṣẹ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ mRNA náà.
zu: Abaxhasi badlala indima ebalulekile ekwesekeni uHlelo ngesamba soxhaso kuze kube yimanje ngezigidi ezingu-117 neFrance ekubeni ngeyokuqala ukuxhasa umsebenzi wokudlulisela ezobuchwepheshe be-mRNA.

am: በስብሰባው ላይ የአውሮፓ ኮሚሽን፣ ቤልጂየም፣ ጀርመን፣ እንዲሁም ኖርዌይ፣ ካናዳ፣ አፍሪካ ህብረት፣ ደቡብ አፍሪካ እና የኤልማ ፋውንዴሽን ተወካዮች ተገኝተዋል።
en: Present at the meeting were representatives from the European Commission, Belgium, Germany, as well as Norway, Canada, African Union, South Africa, and the ELMA Foundation.
ha: A wajen taron akwai wakilan Ƙungiyar Tarayyar Turai da suka haɗa da Belgium da Germany da Norway da Canada da Kungiyar Tarayyar Afirka da Afirka ta Kudu da Gidauniyar ELMA.
sw: Waliohudhuria mkutano huo ni wawakilishi kutoka Tume ya Ulaya, Ubelgiji, Ujerumani, vilevile Norway, Kanada, Umoja wa Afrika, Afrika Kusini, na wakfu wa ELMA.
yo: Àwọn tó péjú síbi ìpàdé náà ni àwọn aṣojú láti Àjọ Ilẹ̀ Yúróópù, Belgium, Germany bákan náà ni Norway, Canada, Àjọ Ìṣọ̀kan Ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀, South Africa, àti ELMA Foundation.
zu: Ababekhona emhlanganweni bekungabamele abaphuma e-European Commission, iBelgium, iGermany kanye neNorway, iCanada, i-Africa Union, iNingizimu Afrika kanye ne-ELMA Foundation.

am: የግሎባል አፌርስ የካናዳ የደቡብ እና የምስራቅ አፍሪካ ዋና ዳይሬክተር ካሮላይን ዴላኒ፡ "ካናዳ ኤም.አር.ኤን.ኤ(mRNA) የቴክኖሎጂ ሽግግር መርሃ ግብር ቀጣይነት ያለው ድጋፍ እንዳረጋገጠች እና ዛሬ በስብሰባው ላይ የ 15 ሚሊዮን የካናዳ ዶላር ተጨማሪ መዋጮ ማድረጓን በደስታ እንገልፃለን።
en: Caroline Delany, GlobalAffairs Canada’s Director General for Southern and Eastern Africa said: “Canada reaffirms its continued support of the mRNA Technology Transfer Programme and we are delighted to announce a further contribution of 15 million Canadian dollars at the meeting today.
ha: Darakta-janar ta Al'amuran Yau da Kullum ta ƙasa Kanada a Kudanci da Gabashin Afirka, Caroline Delany ta ce; Kanada na ba da tabbacin cigaba da tallafawa shirin Musayar Fasaha ta mRNA, kuma a yau muna farin cikin sanar da ƙarin gudunmowa ta miliyan 15 na kuɗin ƙasar.
sw: Caroline Delany, mkurugenzi mkuu wa Global Affairs Kanada kusini na mashariki mwa Afrika alisema: "Kanada inathibitisha kuendelea kuunga mkono mpango wa uhawilishaji Teknolojia wa mRNA na tuna furaha kutangaza mchango zaidi wa Dola milioni 15 za Kanada katika mkutano wa leo.
yo: Caroline Delaney, Olùdarí Àpapọ̀ GlobalAffairs Canada fún Gúúsù àti Ìlà-oòrùn Ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ sọ wí pé: "Orílẹ̀-èdè Canada ń ṣe ìfirinlẹ̀ ìtẹ̀síwájú àtìlẹyìn rẹ̀ fún Ètò Ìfiránṣẹ́ Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ mRNA inú wa sì dùn láti kéde ìtẹ̀síwájú àfikún 15 mílíọ̀nù dọ́là owó orílẹ̀-èdè Canada níbi ìpàdé náà lónì.
zu: UCaroline Delany, uMqondisi Jikelele weGlobal Affairs Canada waseSouthern and Eastern Afrika, uthe: "iCanada iqinisekisa ukuqgubeka nokweseka kwe-mRNA Technology Transfer Programme futhi siyajabula ukumemezela ukuqhubeka kokunikelwa kwezigidi ezingu-15 ngamadola aseCanada emhlanganweni namhlanje.

am: ይህ የካናዳ አጠቃላይ መዋጮ ለፕሮግራሙ እስከ 45 ሚሊዮን የካናዳ ዶላር ያደርሰዋል።
en: This brings Canada’s total contribution to the Programme up to 45 million Canadian dollars.
ha: Da haka jumular gudunmowar da Canada ta ba wa shirin ya kai Dalar Canada miliyan 45.
sw: Hii inaleta jumla ya mchango wa Kanada kwenye mpango hadi Dola milioni 45 za kikanada.
yo: Èyí mú gbogbo owó tí orílẹ̀-èdè Canada ti fi dásí Ètò náà jẹ́ 45 mílíọ̀nù dólà owó orílẹ̀-èdè Canada.
zu: Lokhu kuletha iminikelo eyisamba yeCanada kuHlelo lwezigidi ezingu-45 kumadola aseCanada.

am: እነዚህ ገንዘቦች የ ሀቡን ሥራ በደቡብ አፍሪካ እና በዓለም ዙሪያ ያሉ የኔትወርክ አጋሮችን ይደግፋሉ።
en: These funds support the running of the Hub in South Africa as well as network partners around the world.
ha: Waɗannan kuɗaɗe ana amfani da su ne wajen kula da cibiyar a ƙasar Afirka Kudu da kuma sauran masu haɗin guiwa a faɗin duniya.
sw: Fedha hizi zinasaidia uendeshaji wa Hub nchini Afrika Kusini vilevile washirika wa mtandao Duniani kote.
yo: Àwọn owó wọ̀nyìí ń ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún iṣẹ́ ṣíṣe ní Ibùdó náà ní orílẹ̀-èdè South Africa àti àwọn alájọṣepọ̀ ojú òpó káàkiri àgbáyé.
zu: Lokhu kwesekwa koxhasomali ekusebenzeni kweHabhu eNingizimu Afrika kanye nababambisani bohlelokuxhumana emhlabeni wonke.

am: በአከባቢ እና በክልል ደረጃ የአቅም ግንባታ አስፈላጊነትን አጥብቀንም እናምናለን"፣ሲሉ የአውሮፓ ኮሚሽን ምክትል ዋና ዳይሬክተር ሚስተር ማርቲን ሲሼል ተናግረዋል።
en: We firmly believe in the importance of building capacity at local and regional level”. Mr Martin Seychell, Deputy Executive Director European Commission, said.
ha: a cewar mataimakin babban darkta na Ƙungiyar Tarayyar Turai, Mr. Martin Seychell, mun yarda da muhimmancin nuna ƙoƙarinmu a matakin gida zuwa sauran yankuna.
sw: Tunaamini kwa dhati umuhimu wa kujenga uwezo katika ngazi ya nchi na kikanda", alisema Bw Martin Seychell, Naibu mkurugenzi mtendaji tume ya ulaya.
yo: A ní ìgbàgbọ́ tó rinlẹ̀ nínú pàtàkì ṣíṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ìkápá ní ìpele orílẹ̀-èdè àti ẹkùn agbègbè ". Mr Martin Seychell, Igbákejì Olùdarí Aláṣẹ Àjọ Ilẹ̀ Yúróópù, ló sọ bẹ́ẹ̀.
zu: Siyakhulwa kakhulu ekubalulekeni kokwakha ukukwazi ezingeni lendawo nelesifunda". UMnu Martin Seychell, uSekela Mqondisi omkhulu we-European Commission esho.

am: "ኢሲ(EC) ቀደም ሲል የኤም.አር.ኤን.ኤ(mRNA) የቴክኖሎጂ ሽግግር ማዕከልን ለማቋቋም 40 ሚሊዮን ዩሮ ያበረከተ ሲሆን በቅርቡ ደግሞ የክትባትን የማምረት አቅምን ለማሳለጥ የ15,5 ሚሊዮን ዩሮ ሌላ የገንዘብ ድጋፍ ከኢ.አይ.ቢ(EIB) ጋር ተፈራርሟል።
en: “The EC has already contributed €40 million to the establishment of the mRNA technology transfer Hub and has recently signed another grant with the EIB for €15,5 million to facilitate the expansion of vaccines manufacturing capacity.
ha: EC ta riga ta bayar da gudunmawar miliyan 40 domin samar da Cibiyar Musayar Fasaha ta mRNA kuma ta sanya hannun ba da wani tallafin tare da EIB na miliyan 155 domin taimaka wa yunƙurin faɗaɗa ƙarfin samar da rigakafin.
sw: "EC tayari imechangia yuro milioni 40 katika uanzishwaji wa kituo cha uhawilishaji wa Teknolojia ya mRNA na hivi karibuni imetia saini ruzuku nyingine na EIB kwa yuro milioni 15.5 kuwezesha upanuzi wa uwezo wa kutengeneza chanjo.
yo: "EC ti dá €40 mílíọ̀nù tẹ́lẹ̀ fún ìdásílẹ̀ Ibùdó Ìfiránṣẹ́ Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ mRNA ó sì ti buwọ́lù owó ìrànwọ́ láìpẹ́ yìí pẹ̀lu EIB fún €15,5 mílíọ̀nù láti ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún ìfẹ̀lójú ìkápá ìpèsè àwọn àjẹsára.
zu: "I-EC isivele ixhase ngezigidi ezingu-€40 ukusungula ihabhu yokudlulisela yezobuchwepheshe kweMRNA futhi isanda kusayina esinye isibonelelo nge-EIB kwezigidi ezingu-€15.5 ukusiza ukwandisa amandla okukhiqizwa kwemigomo.

am: ይህ በአውሮፓ ህብረት የጤና ምርቶች ተነሳሽነት ላይ ከ1 ቢሊዮን ዩሮ በላይ ከተሰበሰበበት በአውሮፓ ህብረት ግሎባል የመግቢያ በር ስትራቴጂ ስር ያለው አጠቃላይ ኢንቨስትመንት አካል ነው።
en: This is part of the overall investment under the EU Global Gateway strategy, where more than €1 Billion have been mobilised under the Team Europe Initiative on Manufacturing health products.
ha: Wannan na daga cikin jumular hannun jari a ƙarƙashin Shirin ba da Tallafin Samar da Abubuwan More Rayuwa na Kungiyar Tarayya Turai, inda aka tattara biliyan 1 bisa jagorancin Shirin Samar da Kayayyakin Lafiya.
sw: Hii ni sehemu ya uwekezaji wa jumla ya mkakati wa EU Global Gatway, ambapo zaidi ya yuro Bilioni 1 zimekusanyw chini ya mpango wa timu ya Ulaya juu ya utengenezaji wa bidhaa za afya.
yo: Èyí jẹ́ lára àpapọ ìdókówò lábẹ́ ìlànà-iṣẹ́ EU Global Gateway, níbi tí wọ́n ti ṣe àkójọ €1 bílíọ̀nù lé lábẹ́ Ikọ̀ Ìpilẹ̀ṣẹ̀ Ilẹ̀ Yúróópù lórí Ìpèsè àwọn ohun èlò ìlera.
zu: Lokhu yingxenye yotshalomali lonke ngaphansi kwesu le EU Global Gateway, lapho ngaphezu kwesigidigidi esisodwa sama-euro selihlanganisiwe ngaphansi komzamo weTeam Europe ekukhiqizweni kwemikhiqizo yezempilo.

am: በሁሉም የአለም ክልሎች ከፍተኛ ደረጃ ያላቸውን ክትባቶች ማምረት ብቻ ሳይሆን ፈጣን እና ፍትሃዊ የሆነ ክትባቶችን ተደራሽ ለማድረግ አሁን ሊከሰቱ የሚችሉ የቁጥጥር እና የፍላጎት ማነቆዎችን መፍታት አስፈላጊ ነው ።"
en: It is now particularly important to also address possible regulatory and demand bottlenecks, to ensure not only production of vaccines of the highest standard in all regions of the world, but also rapid and equitable access to those vaccines.”
ha: A yanzu, ba kawai iya buƙatar ɗaukar mataki na kula da samar da mafi ingancin rigakafi ga kowanne yanki na duniya ne kaɗai abin damuwa ba, face ƙoƙarin tabbatar da cewa kowa na iya samun rigakafin daidai-wa-daida.
sw: Kwa sasa ni muhimu hasa kushughulikia vikwazo vinavyowezekana vya udhibiti na mahitaji, ili kuhakikisha sio tu uzalishaji wa chanjo za kiwango cha juu katika maeneo yote Duniani, lakini pia upatikanaji wa haraka na sawa wa chanjo hizo"
yo: Ó ti wá ṣe pàtàkì pàápàá báyìí láti kojú àwọn ìfúnpinpin òfin àti ìbéèrè tó ṣe é ṣe, láti rí i dájú pé kìí ṣe ìpèsè àjẹsára tí wọ́n jẹ́ ojúlówó tó dára jùlọ ní gbogbo ẹkùn agbègbè àgbáyé nìkan, ṣùgbọ́n pẹ̀lu ànfààní ojú ẹsẹ̀ àti adọ́gba sí àwọn àjẹsára wọ̀nyẹn."
zu: Manje sekubalulekile ukuphinde sibhekane nokulawula okungenzeka nokukhona okufunakalyo, ukuqinisekisa ukuthiakukhona ukukhiqiza kuphela kwemigomo esezingeni eliphezulu kuzona zonke izifunda emhlabeni kodwa nokuphindeka kokutholakala okulinganayo kwaleyo migomo."

am: የአለም ጤና ድርጅት ስትራቴጂካዊ አቅጣጫዎችን እና ተነሳሽነቶችን ለመምራት ቁልፍ የአመራር ሹመቶች
en: Key leadership appointments made to drive WHO strategic direction and initiatives
ha: an naɗa muƙamai 143 domin jan ragamar ayyukan Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya.
sw: Uteuzi muhimu wa uongozi ulifanywa ili kusimamia muelekeo na mipango ya kimkakati ya WHO
yo: Àwọn ìyàn sípò aṣíwájú pàtàkì tí wọ́n ṣe láti darí ìlànà-iṣẹ́ ìdarí àti ìpilẹ̀ṣẹ̀ WHO
zu: Ukuqokwa kobuholi oubalulekile okwenziwelwe ukuhambisa indlela yesu nemizamo yeWHO

am: የዓለም ጤና ድርጅት (WHO) በጄኔቫ በሚገኘው ዋና መሥሪያ ቤቱ አመራር ቡድን ውስጥ አምስት አዳዲስ ከፍተኛ ሰዎችን ሾሟል።
en: The World Health Organization (WHO) has appointed five new senior figures to its headquarters leadership team in Geneva.
ha: Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya (WHO) ta naɗa sabbin manyan jami'an biyar zuwa shalkwatarta da ke Geneva.
sw: Shirika la afya Duniani (WHO) limeteua vigogo watano wapya kwa tume yake ya uongozi ya makao makuu mjini Jeniva.
yo: Àjọ Elétò Ìlera Àgbáyé (WHO) ti ṣe ìyànsípò àwọn lọ́gà-lọ́gà márùn-ún tuntun sí ikò adarí olú ilé-iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ ní Geneva.
zu: Inhlangano yeZempilo yoMhlaba (WHO) sebeqoke izikhulu eziphezulu iminyaka emihlanu ukuba ngabaholi eqembini labaholi ekomkhulu eGeneva.

am: አዲሶቹ ሹመቶች ዶ/ር ቴዎድሮስ አድሃኖም ገብረእየሱስን ለሁለተኛ አምስት ዓመታት በዋና ዳይሬክተርነት መሾማቸውን ተከትሎ ነው።
en: The new appointments follow the reappointment of Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus to his second five-year term as Director-General.
ha: Sabbin naɗe-naɗen sun biyo bayan sake naɗa Dakta Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus a matsayin darakta-janar, inda zai yi shekaru 5 ƙari kan wa'adinsa na farko.
sw: Uteuzi huo mpya unafuatia kuteuliwa tena kwa Dk Tedros Adhanom Ghereyesus katika muhula wake wa pili wa miaka mitano kama mkurugenzi mkuu.
yo: Àwọn ìyànsípò tuntun náà tẹ̀lé ìtúnni yàn sípò Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus sí sáà ọlọ́dún-márùn-ún kejì gẹ́gẹ́ bíi Olùdarí-Àpapọ̀.
zu: Ukuqokwa okusha kulandela ukuphinde kuqokwe uDkt Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus kuhlandla lesibili leminyaka emihlanu njengoMqondisi Jikelele.

am: አጠቃላይ የአመራር ቡድኑ ለቀጣዮቹ አምስት አመታት ከድርጅቱ ቅድሚያ ከሚሰጣቸው ጉዳዮች ጋር እንዲጣጣም የተጠናከረ ሲሆን እነዚህን ቅድሚያ የሚሰጣቸውን ጉዳዮች እና የአለም ጤና ድርጅትን ትልቅ የለውጥ አጀንዳ ለማስቀጠል ከዋና ዳይሬክተር ጋር በቅርበት ይሰራሉ።
en: The overall leadership team has been consolidated to align with the Organization’s priorities for the next five years and will work closely with the Director-General to drive forward these priorities and WHO’s ambitious transformation agenda.
ha: An buƙaci ɗaukacin shuwagabannin da aka naɗa da su sanya muradun hukumar a gaba a cikin shekaru biyar da za su yi masu zuwa da kuma yin aiki tare da darakta-janar wajen cimma waɗannan muradu da burin Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya na kawo sauye-sauye.
sw: Timu ya jumla ya uongozi imeunganishwa ili kuendana na vipaumbele vya shirika kwa miaka mitano ijayo na itafanya kazi kwa karibu na mkurugenzi mkuu ili kuendeleza vipaumbele hivi na ajenda ya mabadiliko ya WHO.
yo: Àpapọ ikọ̀ àwọn olùdarí náà ni wọ́n ti ṣe láti dọ́gba pẹ̀lú àwọn ohun pàtàkì Àjọ náà fún ọdún márùn-ún tó ń bọ̀ tí wọn ó sì ṣiṣẹ́ papọ̀ pẹ̀lú Olùdarí-Àpapọ̀ láti mú ìtẹ̀síwájú bá àwọn nǹkan pàtàkì wọ̀nyìí àti èròngbà àyípadà àlá WHO.
zu: Ubuholi bonkebeqembu buhlanganiswe ukuhambisana nokuhamba phambili kweNhlangano kuleminyaka emihlanu ezayo nokusebenzisana noMqondisi Jikelele ukuhambisa okuya kukhona okuhamba phambili ne-ajenda yentshisekelo yoguquko lweWHO.

am: የአለም ጤና ድርጅት 13ኛ አጠቃላይ የስራ መርሃ ግብር (GPW13) አተገባበር እና የ"ሶስትዮሽ ቢሊየን" ግቦችን እና ከጤና ጋር የተያያዙ የዘላቂ ልማት ግቦችን ለማሳካት እድገትን ለማፋጠን ለሚቀጥሉት አምስት አመታት የአለም ጤና ድርጅት ስራ በአምስት ቅድሚያዎች ላይ ያተኮረ ነው።
en: To accelerate progress on implementation of WHO’s 13th General Programme of Work (GPW13), and achievement of its “triple billion” targets and the health-related Sustainable Development Goals, WHO’s work for the coming five years is focused on five priorities:
ha: Domin tabbatar da cimma aiwatar da Tsararrun Manufofin Ayyukanta Karo na 13(GPW13) da ta ware wa biliyoyin kuɗi da cimma Muradun Raya Ƙasa Mai Ɗorewa da suka shafi lafiya, Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya za ta kula da wasu muhimman abubuwan guda biyar:
sw: Ili kuharakisha maendeleo katika utekelezaji wa mpango mkuu wa 13 wa kazi za WHO (GPW13), kufikia malengo yake ya "Bilioni tatu" na malengo ya maendeleo endelevu yanayousiana na afya, kazi ya WHO kwa miaka mitano ijayo inazingatia vipaumbele vitano:
yo: Láti mú kí ìlọsíwájú yá lórí ìṣàmúlò Ètò Àpapọ̀ fún Iṣẹ́ WHO 13th (GPW13), àti àṣeyọrí àfojúsùn "bílíọ̀nù mẹ́ta" rẹ̀ àti Àwọn Èròngbà Ìdàgbàsókè Alálòpẹ́ ajẹmọ́-ìlera náà, iṣẹ́ WHO fún ọdún márùn-ún tó ń bọ̀ dá lórí àwọn nǹkan pàtàkì márùn-ún:
zu: Ukuqhuba inqubekela phambili yokwenza kweWHO 13th General Programme of WORK (GPW13) ukuthola okuqondiwe "okungezigidigidi ezintathu" nokuhlobene nezempilo zeSuatainable Development Goals, umsebenzi weWHO kuleminyaka emihlanu ezayo egxile kokuhamba phambili okuhlanu:

am: ጤናን ወደ ማጎልበት እና የበሽታን መንስዔዎችን በመቅረፍ ማዕቀፍ ለውጥ ማድረግ;
en: making a paradigm shift towards promoting health and preventing disease by addressing its root causes;
ha: Sauya dabarun fuskantar abin da ya shafi haɓaka lafiya da kare afkuwar cututtuka ta hanyar magance musabbabansu daga tushe.
sw: Kufanya mabadiliko ya mtazamo kuelekea kukuza afya na kuzuia magonjwa kwa kushughulikia vyanzo vyake;
yo: ṣíṣe àyípadà iṣẹ́ lọ sí ibi ìpolongo ìlera àti ìdènà ààrùn pẹ̀lú kíkojú àwọn aṣokùnfà ìpìlẹ̀ rẹ̀;
zu: ukwenza ukulandelana ngendlela okuya ekugqugquzeleni ezempilo nokuvikela isifo ngokubhekana nomsuka ozidalayo;

am: የጤና ስርዓቶችን ወደ የመጀመሪያ ደረጃ ጤና አጠባበቅ ማስተካከል;
en: radically reorienting health systems towards primary health care;
ha: sauya tsarin lafiya zuwa ba wa cibiyoyin lafiya matakin farko muhimmanci;
sw: Kuelekeza upya mifumo ya afya kuelekea huduma ya afya ya msingi
yo: ṣíṣe àtúntò àwọn ètò ìlera fún ètò ìlera alábọ́dé láti ìpìlẹ̀;
zu: ushintsho olwenzekayo kuzinhlelo zezempilo okuya ekunakekelweni kwezempilo zokuqala;

am: ለጤና ድንገተኛ አደጋ ዝግጁነት እና ምላሽ ስርዓቶችን ማጠናከር;
en: strengthening the systems for health emergency preparedness and response;
ha: Ƙarfafa tsarin zama ciki shirin ko-ta-kwana domin kai agajin gaggawa a fannin lafiya.
sw: Kuimarisha mifumo ya maandalizi na majibu ya dharura ya afya;
yo: Ríró àwọn ètò náà lágbára fún ìmúrasílẹ̀ àti ìdáhùn sí pàjáwírì ìlera;
zu: ukuqinisa izinhlelo zokuzilungiselela okuphuthumayo nokuphendula;

am: የጤና ጥበቃን ወደፊት ለማራመድ የሳይንስ፣ ፈጠራ፣ መረጃ እና ቴክኖሎጂዎች ኃይልን መጠቀም; እና
en: harnessing the power of science, innovation, data and technologies to advance health; and
ha: Amfani da tasirin kimiyya da ƙere-ƙere da rahotanni da fasahohi wajen ciyar da lafiya gaba, da
sw: Kutumia nguvu ya sayansi, uvumbuzi , Data na teknolojia ili kuendeleza afya; na
yo: ṣíṣe àmúlò agbára sáyẹ́nsì, ìmọ̀ ọ̀tun, dátà àti àwọn ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ láti mú ìlọsíwájú bá ilera; àti
zu: amahhanisi amandla esayensi,ukwenza kabusha,idatha nezobuchwepheshe ukwenzangcono ezempilo; kanye

am: የዓለም ጤና ድርጅትን እንደ መሪ ባለስልጣን ማጠናከር እና በአገሮች ላይ ተጽእኖ ማሳደር።
en: strengthening WHO as the leading authority on global health and to achieve impact in countries.
ha: ƙarfafa tasirin Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya (WHO) a matsayin jagoran kan duk abin da ya shafi lafiya a duniya domin cimma muradunta a ƙasashe.
sw: Kuimarisha WHO kama mamlaka inayoongoza kwa afya Duniani na kufikia athari katika nchi.
yo: ríró WHO lágbára gẹ́gẹ́ bíi aláṣẹ tó ń léwájú lórí ìlera àgbáyé àti láti ṣe àṣeyọrí ipa ní àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè.
zu: nokuqinisa iWHO njengabanegunya lokuhola kwezempilo zomhlaba nokuthola umthelela emazweni.

am: እኩል ቁጥር ያላቸውን የሴቶች እና የወንዶች ቁጥር ያቀፈው የዋናው መሥሪያ ቤት አመራር ቡድን ከዓለም ጤና ድርጅት የክልል እና የሀገር ውስጥ ቢሮዎች ጋር በጋራ ይሰራል።
en: The headquarters leadership team, comprising equal numbers of women and men, will work jointly with WHO regional and country offices.
ha: shugabannin shalkwatar da suka haɗa adadi kai ɗaya tsakanin maza da mata, za su yi aiki tare sauran ofisoshin hukumar da ke yankuna da ƙasashe.
sw: Timu ya uongozi ya makao makuu, inayojumuisha idadi sawa ya wanawake na wanaume, itafanya kazi kwa pamoja na ofisi za WHO za kikanda na nchi.
yo: Ikọ̀ adarí olú ilé-iṣẹ́ náà, tó jẹ́ àpapọ iye àwọn ọkùnrin àti àwọn obìnrin kan náà, máa ṣiṣẹ́ papọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn ọ́fíísì ẹkùn agbègbè àti orílẹ̀-èdè.
zu: Qembu labaholi ekomkhulu, linenamba elinganayo kubantu besifazane nabesilisa, bazosebenza ngokuhlanganyela nesifunda seWHO namahhovisi emazweni.

am: የዋናው መሥሪያ ቤት አመራር ቡድን አዲስ አባላት፡ ዶ/ር ጄረሚ ፋራራ እ.ኤ.አ ከግንቦት 8 ቀን 2023 ጀምሮ የዓለም ጤና ድርጅት ዋና ተመራማሪ ይሆናሉ።
en: New members of the headquarters leadership team: Dr Jeremy Farrar will become WHO’s Chief Scientist as of 8 May 2023.
ha: Cikin sabbin jagororin da ke shalkwatar, Dakta Jeremy Farrar ne zai zama babban jami'in kimiyya na Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya daga 8 ga watan Mayun 2023.
sw: Wanachama wapya wa timu ya uongozi ya makao makuu: Dk Jeremy Farrar atakuwa mwanasayansi mkuu wa WHO kuanzia tarehe 8 Mei 2023.
yo: Àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ tuntun nínú ikọ̀ adarí olú ilé-iṣẹ́ náà náà: Dr Jeremy Farrar máa di Olórí Onímọ̀ Sáyẹ́nsì WHO láti 8 oṣù Èbìbí ọdún 2023.
zu: Amalungu amasha eqembu lobuholi ekomkhulu:uDkt Jeremy Farrar ozoba nguSosayensi omkhulu weWHO kusukela ngomhlaka-8 kuNhlaba 2023.

am: የዶ/ር ፋራር ሹመት ቀደም ብሎ እ.ኤ.አ በታኅሣሥ 2022 ይፋ ነበር።
en: The appointment of Dr Farrar was previously announced in December 2022.
ha: A baya an sanar da naɗin Dakta Farrar a cikin Disamba 2022.
sw: Uteuzi wa Dk Farrar ulitangazwa hapo awali mwezi Desemba 2022.
yo: Ìyànsípò Dr Farrar ni wọ́n ti kọ́kọ́ kéde ní oṣù Ọ̀pẹ ọdún 2022.
zu: Ukuqokwa kukaDkt Farrar kwamenyezelwa ngoZibandlela 2022.

am: በዚህ ተግባር ዶ/ር ፋራር የሳይንስ ክፍልን ይቆጣጠራሉ፣ በዓለም ዙሪያ ያሉ ምርጥ የሳይንስ እና ፈጠራ ባለሙያዎችን እና ኔትወርኮችን በማሰባሰብ ከፍተኛ ጥራት ያላቸውን የጤና ፖሊሲዎች እና አገልግሎቶችን በጣም ለሚያስፈልጋቸው ሰዎች እንዲመሩ፣ እንዲያዘጋጁ እና እንዲያቀርቡ ያደርጋል።
en: In this role Dr Farrar will oversee the Science Division, bringing together the best experts and networks in science and innovation from around the world to guide, develop and deliver high quality health policies and services to the people who need them most.
ha: A cikin wannan aikin, Dakta Farrar zai kula da dukkanin sashen Kimiyya tare da tattaro kan ƙwararrun masana da hanyoyin sadarwa na kimiyya da ƙere-ƙere daga ko ina a faɗin duniya ya jagoranta, ya tabbatar da ci gaba da isar da ingantattun manufofi da ayyuka na kiwon lafiya ga mutanen da suke buƙatar su.
sw: Katika jukumu hili Dk Farrar atasimamia kitengo cha sayansi, akiwaleta pamoja watalaamu wobobezi na mitandao katika sayansi na uvumbuzi kutoka Duniani kote ili kuongoza, kuendeleza na kutoa sera na huduma za afya za ubora wa juu kwa watu wanaohitaji zaidi.
yo: Nínú ipò yìí Dr Farrar máa ṣàmójútó Ẹ̀ka Ìmọ Sáyẹ́nsì, tí yóò ṣe àkójọpọ̀ àwọn akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ àti àwọn ojú òpó tó dára jùlọ àti nínú ìmọ sáyẹ́nsì àti ìmọ̀ ọ̀tun jákèjádò àgbáyé láti ṣe ìtọ́nisọ́nà, àgbédìde àti àgbékalẹ̀ àwọn ojúlówó òfin ìlera àti ìpèsè iṣẹ́ fún àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n nílò rẹ̀ jùlọ.
zu: Kulesisikhundla uDkt Farrar uzobheka umkhakha wezesayensi, ukuhlanganisa ndawonye ngoti abaphambili nohlelokuxhumana kwezesayensi nokwenza kabusha emhlabeni wonke ukuyalela, ukudevelopha nokuhambisa ezempilo ezisezingeni eliphezulu inqubomgomo nemisebenzi kubantu abayidinga kakhulu.

am: ወደ አለም ጤና ድርጀት (WHO) ከመቀላቀላቸው በፊት ዶ/ር ፋራር የዌልኮም ትረስት ዳይሬክተር ነበሩ።
en: Prior to joining WHO Dr Farrar was Director of the Wellcome Trust.
ha: Kafin Dakta Farrar ya fara aikin Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya wato WHO, ya kasance Darakta ne a Wellcome Trust.
sw: Kabla ya kujiunga na WHO Dk Farrar alikuwa mkurugenzi wa Wellcome Trust.
yo: Ṣíwájú kí ó tó darapọ̀ mọ́ WHO Dr Farrar ni Olùdarí fún Wellcome Trust.
zu: Ngaphambi kokujoyina iWHO uDkt Farrar ubenguMqondisi weWellcome Trust.

am: እ.ኤ.አ በ2013 ዌልኮምን ከመቀላቀሉ በፊት ዶ/ር ፋራር በቬትናም በሚገኘው የሀሩር ክልል በሽታዎች ሆስፒታል የክሊኒካል ምርምር ክፍል ዳይሬክተር በመሆን 17 ዓመታትን አሳልፈዋል፣ የምርምር ፍላጎቶቹ በሚከሰቱ ተላላፊ በሽታዎች ላይ በማተኮር በዓለም አቀፍ ጤና ላይም ያተኮሩ ነበሩ።
en: Before joining Wellcome in 2013 Dr Farrar spent 17 years as Director of the Clinical Research Unit at the Hospital for Tropical Diseases in Vietnam where his research interests were in global health with a focus on emerging infectious diseases.
ha: Kafin shigarsa Wellcome a shekarar 2013, Dakta Farrar ya shafe shekaru 17 a matsayin Daraktan Sashin Bincike gwaje-gwaje a Asibitin cututtuka masu saurin yaɗuwa ta ƙasar Vietnam inda yafi mayar da hankalin bincikensa kan kiwon lafiyar duniya tare da bincike kan sabbin cututtukan da ke tasowa.
sw: Kabla ya kujiunga na Wellcome mwaka 2013 Dk Farrar alitumia miaka 17 kama mkurugenzi wa kitengo cha utafiti wa Kliniki katika hospitali ya magonjwa ya kitropiki nchini Vietnamu ambapo maslahi yake ya utafiti yalikuwa katika afya ya kiamataifa kwa kuzingatia magonjwa ya kuambukiza yanajitokeza.
yo: Kí ó tó darapọ̀ mọ́ Wellcome ní ọdún 2013 Dr Farrar lo ọdún 17 gẹ́gẹ́ bíi Olùdarí fún Ẹ̀ka Ìwádìí Ajẹmọ́-ìlera ní Ilé Ìwòsàn fún Àwọn Ààrùn Ìgbóná ní Vietnam níbi tí àwọn àfojúsùn ìwádìí ti dá lórí ìlera àgbáyé pẹ̀lú àdojúkọ àwọn ààrùn àkóràn tó ń jẹyọ.
zu: Ngaphambi kokujoyina Wellcome ngo-2013 uDkt Farrar uchithe iminyaka engu-17 njengoMqondisi weClinical Reaserch Unit esiBhadlela seTropical Diseases eVietnam lapho ukucwaninga kwakhe kwakugxile kwezempilo emhlabeni ngokugxila ekuveleni kwezifo ezithelelanayo.

am: ዶ/ር ፋራራ የህክምና ዲግሪ እና ፒኤችዲ ያለው ክሊኒካዊ ተመራማሪ ነው።
en: Dr Farrar is a clinician researcher with a medical degree and a PhD.
ha: Dakta Farrar mai bincike ne wanda ke da digiri na farko har zuwa na uku wato PhD a fannin likitanci.
sw: Dk Farrar ni mtafiti wa kliniki mwenye shahada ya matibabu na shahada ya Uzamivu.
yo: Dr Farrar jẹ́ oníwádìí ajẹmọ́-ìlera pẹ̀lú ìwé ẹ̀rí ìṣègùn àti PhD.
zu: UDkt Farrar ungumcwaningi wezokwelapha neziqu zobudokotela kanye nePHD.

am: ዶ/ር አይላን ሊ እ.ኤ.አ ከግንቦት 8 ቀን 2023 ጀምሮ ሁለንተናዊ የጤና ሽፋን፣ ጤናማ ህዝቦች ረዳት ዋና ዳይሬክተር ይሆናሉ።
en: Dr Ailan Li will become Assistant Director-General for Universal Health Coverage, Healthier Populations as of 8 May 2023.
ha: Dakta Ailan Li zai zama Mataimakin Darakta-Janar na hukumar Universal Health Coverage Healthier Populations tun daga ranar 8 ga Mayu 2023.
sw: Dkt Alian Li atakuwa mkurugenzi mkuu msaidizi wa huduma ya afya kwa wote, idadi ya watu wenye afya bora kuanzia tarehe 8 Mei 2023.
yo: Dr Ailan Li máa di Igbákejì Olùdarí-Àpapọ̀ fún Kíkárí Ìlera Àgbáyé, Àwọn Ènìyàn Tó Ní Àlàáfíà láti 8 oṣù Èbìbí ọdún 2023.
zu: UDkt Ailan Li uzoba nguMsizi Mqondisi Jikelele weUniversal Health Coverage,Healthier Populations kusukela ngomhlaka-8 kuNhlaba 2023.

am: በዚህ ሚና ዶ / ር ሊ የአየር ንብረት ለውጥን ፣ የትምባሆ ቁጥጥርን ፣ የኬሚካል ደህንነትን ፣ የመንገድ ደህንነትን ፣ የምግብ ስርዓቶችን ጨምሮ ከአካባቢ ፣ ከማህበራዊ እና ኢኮኖሚያዊ የጤና ጉዳዮች ጋር በተያያዙ ጣልቃገብነቶች የተሻለ ጤና እና ደህንነትን ለማስተዋወቅ እና የተመጣጠነ ምግብ፣ የአካል ብቃት እንቅስቃሴ፣ የአየር ብክለት እና ጨረሮች በአንድ ጤና አቀራረብ የሚያረገውን የድርጅቱን ጥረት ይቆጣጠራል።
en: In this role Dr Li will oversee the Organization’s efforts to promote better health and well-being through interventions relating to the environmental, social, and economic determinants of health, including climate change, tobacco control, chemical safety, road safety, food systems and nutrition, physical activity, air pollution and radiation, through a One Health approach.
ha: A cikin wannan mataki, Dakta Li zai kula da ƙoƙarin ƙungiyar don tabbatar da ingantacciyar lafiya da walwala ta hanyar tsoma baki akan al'amuran da suka shafi muhalli, zamantakewa, da tattalin arziki na kiwon lafiya, gami da sauyin yanayi, sarrafa sigari, amincin sinadarai, kula da hanyoyi, abinci, tsarin abinci mai gina jiki, motsa jiki, gurɓatacciyar iska da radiation, ta hanyar One Health.
sw: Katika jukumu hili Dk Li atasimamia juhudu za shirika za kukuza afya bora na ustawi kupitia afua zinazohusu viashiria vya afya kimazingira, kijamii na kiuchumi, ikijumuisha maadiliko ya Tabianchi, udhibiti wa Tumbaku, usalama wa kemikali, usalama wa barabarani, mifumo ya chakula na lishe, shughuli za kawaida, uchafuzi wa hewa na mionzi, kupitia mbinuya Afya ya Pamoja.
yo: Nínú ipò yìí Dr Li máa ṣàmójútó àwọn ìgbìyànjú Àjò náà láti ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún ìlera tó dára àti ìgbáyégbádùn nípasẹ̀ àwọn ìdásí tó níṣe pẹ̀lú agbègbè, àwùjọ, àti àwọn aṣokùnfà ọrọ̀ ajé fún ìlera, tó fi mọ́ àyípadà ojú ọjọ́, ìdarí tábà, ààbò kẹ́míkà, ààbò ojú pópó, àwọn ètò oúnjẹ àti èròjà aṣara lóore, àwọn iṣẹ́ àfojúrí, bíba afẹ́fẹ́ jẹ́ àti ìtànkálẹ̀, nípasẹ ìlànà Ìlera Kan.
zu: Kulesisikhundla uDkt Li izobheka imizamo yeNhlangano ukugqugquzela ukubangcono kwezempilo nokuphila ngokungenelela okuhlobene nezendawo ezenhlalakahle, ezempilo zokubhekene nezomnotho okufaka ukuguquka kwesimo sezulu, ukulawula ugwayi, ukuphepha kwamakhemikhali, ukuphepha komgwaqo, izinhlelo zokudla nokunomsoco, ukusebenza siqu, ukungcoliswa komoya nokwemisebe yelana ngendlela ye-One Health.

am: ዶ/ር ሊ እ.ኤ.አ ከሀምሌ 15 ቀን 2019 ጀምሮ በካምቦዲያ መንግሥት የዓለም ጤና ድርጅት ተወካይ ሆነው እያገለገሉ ነው።
en: Dr Li has been serving as the WHO Representative to the Kingdom of Cambodia since 15 July 2019.
ha: Dr Li yana aiki a matsayin wakilin Hukumar WHO a Masarautar Cambodia tun daga ranar 15 ga Yuli 2019.
sw: Dk Li amekuwa akihudumu kama mwakilishi wa WHO katika Ulaflme wa Kambodia tangu 15 julai 2019.
yo: Dr Li ti ń ṣiṣẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bíi Aṣojú WHO ní Kingdom of Cambodia láti 15 oṣù Agẹmọ ọdún 2019.
zu: UDkt Li ubelokhu esebenza njengomele iWHO eKingdom of Cambodia kusukela ngomhlaka-15 kuNtulikazi 2019.

am: ከዚህ ሚና በፊት ዶ / ር ሊ በምዕራብ ፓስፊክ ውስጥ በአለም ጤና ድርጅት ክልላዊ ቢሮ ውስጥ ለ አለም ጤና ድርጅት የጤና ድንገተኛ አደጋዎች መርሃ ግብር የክልል ድንገተኛ አደጋ ዳይሬክተር ሆነው አገልግለዋል።
en: Prior to this role, Dr Li served as Regional Emergency Director for the WHO Health Emergencies Programme in the WHO Regional Office for the Western Pacific.
ha: Kafin wannan rawar, Dakta Li ya kasance Daraktan Gaggawa na Shirin Agajin Lafiya na Hukumar WHO a Ofishin Yanki na WHO na Yammacin Pacific.
sw: Kabla ya jukumu hili, Dk Li aliwahi kuwa mkurugenzi wa Dharura wa kanda wa mpango wa dhrura wa afya wa WHO katika ofisi ya kanda ya WHO ya Pasifiki Magharibi.
yo: Ṣíwájú ipò yìí, Dr Li ti ṣiṣẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bíi Olùdarí Pàjáwírì Ẹkùn Agbègbè fún Ètò Àwọn Pàjáwírì Ìlera WHO ní Ọ́fíísì Ẹkùn Agbègbè WHO fún Western Pacific.
zu: Ngaphambi kwalesisikhundla, uDkt Li wasebenza njenge Regional Emergency Director weWHO Health Emergencies Programme eHhovisi leSifunda leWHO eWestern Pacific.

am: ዶ/ር ሊ በጤና ማህበራዊ ሳይንስ ዲግሪ እና የህክምና ዲግሪ አላቸው።
en: Dr Li holds a medical degree and degree in health social sciences.
ha: Dakta Li yana da digiri na likitanci da digiri a fannin kimiyyar zamantakewar lafiya.
sw: Dk Li ana shahada ya matibabu na shahada katika Sayansi ya afya ya kijamii.
yo: Dr Li ní ìwé-ẹ̀rí ìṣẹ̀gun àti ìwé-ẹ̀rí nínú sáyẹ́nsì ìlera àwùjọ.
zu: UDkt Li uneziqu zobudokotela neziqu kwezesayensi yenhlalakahle yezempilo.

am: ዶ/ር ዩኪኮ ናካታኒ እ.ኤ.አ ከግንቦት 2 ቀን 2023 ጀምሮ የመድኃኒት እና የጤና ምርቶች ተደራሽነት ረዳት ዋና ዳይሬክተር ይሆናሉ።
en: Dr Yukiko Nakatani will become Assistant Director-General for Access to Medicines and Health Products as of 2 May 2023.
ha: Dakta Yukiko Nakatani zai zama Mataimakin Darakta-Janar na Samumar da Magunguna da Kayayyakin Lafiya tun daga ranar 2 ga watan Mayu 2023.
sw: Dkt Yukiko Nakatani atakuwa mkurugenzi mkuu msaidizi wa upatikanaji wa dawa na bidhaa za afya kuanzia tarehe 2 Mei 2023.
yo: Dr Yukiko Nakatani máa di Igbákejì Olùdarí-Àpapọ̀ fún Ànfààní sí Àwọn Oògùn àti Àwọn Ohun Èlò Ìlera láti 2 oṣù Èbìbí ọdún 2023.
zu: UDkt Yukiko Nakatani uzoba nguMszi woMqondisi Jikelele wokungena kwezemithi nokukhiqizwa nemikhiqizo yezempilo.

am: በዚህ ሚና ዶ/ር ናካታኒ የ አለም ጤና ድርጅት ደንቦች እና ፖሊሲዎች ልማት እና አተገባበር ይቆጣጠራሉ ፣ ይህም ወረርሽኞችን ለመከላከል እና ምላሽ ለመስጠትን ጨምሮ በሁሉም ቦታ ለሚገኙ ሁሉም ህዝቦች ጥራት ያለው መድሃኒት ፣ ክትባቶች እና ምርመራዎች ፍትሃዊ ተደራሽነትን ለማረጋገጥ ነው።
en: In this role Dr Nakatani will oversee the development and implementation of WHO’s norms and policies to ensure equitable access to quality medicines, vaccines and diagnostics for all populations everywhere, including for preventing and responding to epidemics.
ha: A wannan muƙamin, Dakta Nakatani zai sa ido kan ci gaba da aiwatar da ƙa'idoji da manufofin Hukumar WHO don tabbatar da samun daidaiton damar samun ingantattun magunguna, alluran rigakafi da binciken lafiya ga dukkan al'ummomi a ko'ina, gami da rigakafi annoba.
sw: Katika jukumu hili Dk Nakatani atasimamaia maendeleo na utekelezaji wa kanuni na sera za WHO ili kuhakikisha upatikanaji sawa wa dawa bora, chanjo na uchunguzi kwa watu wote kila mahali, ikiwa ni pamoja na kuzuia na kukabiliana na magonjwa ya mlipuko.
yo: Nínú ipò yìí Dr Nakatani máa ṣàmójútó àgbékalẹ̀ àti àmúlò àwọn ìṣe àti òfin WHO láti ṣe àrídájú ànfààní sí adọ́gba sí àwọn ojúlówó oògùn, àwọn àjẹsára àti àyẹ̀wò fún ààrùn fún gbogbo àwọn ènìyàn ní ibi gbogbo, tó fi mọ́ ìdènà àti ìdáhùn sí àjàkálẹ̀ ààrùn.
zu: Kulesisikhundla uDkt Nakatani uzobheka ukuthuthuka nokwenza kwemigomo yeWHO nezinqubomgomo ukuqinisekisa ukutola ukulingana kumithi efanele, imigomo kanye nokuxilongwa kusona sonke isibalo sabantu yonke indawo okufaka ukuvikela nokuphendula ku-ephidemikhi.

am: ዶ/ር ናካታኒ የጃፓን የጤና፣ የሰራተኛ እና ደህንነት ጥበቃ ሚኒስቴር የካንሰር እና የበሽታ መቆጣጠሪያ ክፍል ዳይሬክተር እና በጃፓን ለኮቪድ-19 የክትባት ግብረ ኃይል ሚኒስትር ዴኤታ የቴክኒክ አማካሪ ሆነው ሲያገለግሉ ቆይተዋል።
en: Dr Nakatani has been serving as the Director of the Cancer and Disease Control Division of the Japanese Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare and as the Technical Advisor to the Minister of State for the COVID-19 Vaccination Task Force in Japan.
ha: Dakta Nakatani ya kasance Daraktan Sashin Kula da Cututtukan Daji na Ma'aikatar Lafiya, Ƙwadago da Jin Daɗin Jama'a ta Ƙasar Japan kuma a matsayin mai ba da shawara na fasaha ga Karamin Ministan Kula da Rigakafin Cutar COVID-19 a Ƙasar Japan.
sw: Dkt Nakatani amekuwa mkurugenzi wa kitengo cha kudhibiti saratani na magonjwa cha wizara ya afya, kazi na ustawi wa Japani na kama mshauri wa kiufundi wa waziri wa nchi wa kikosi kazi cha chanjo ya UVIKO-19 nchini Japani.
yo: Dr Nakatani ti ń ṣiṣẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bíi Olùdarí fún Ẹ̀ka Ààrùn Jẹjẹrẹ àti Ìdènà Ààrùn ti Ilé-iṣẹ́ Ìjọba tó ń Rí Sí Ètò Ìlera, Òṣìṣẹ́ àti Ìgbáyégbádùn ní orílẹ̀-èdè Japan àti gẹ́gẹ́ bíi Olùbánidámọ́ràn ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ fún Mínísítà fún Ìpínlè fún Àwọn Òṣìṣẹ́ Abẹ́rẹ́ Àjẹsára COVID-19 ní orílẹ̀-èdè Japan.
zu: UDKt Nakatani ususebenze njengoMqondisi woMdlavuza nedivishini yokulawula izifo eJapanese uNgqongqoshe weZmpilo,ezokusebenza nenhlalakahle njengoTechnica Advisory kuMinister of State wezokusebenza zokugoma iCOVID-19 eJapan.

am: ዶ/ር ናካታኒ የሕክምና ዲግሪ እና በሕዝብ ጤና ፒኤችዲ አግኝተዋል።
en: Dr Nakatani holds a medical degree and a PhD in public health.
ha: Dakta Nakatani yana da digirin farko a ɓangaren likitanci da digirin digirgir a fannin kiwon lafiyar jama'a.
sw: Dk Nakatani ana shahada ya matibabu na shahada ya Uzamivu katiak afya ya umma.
yo: Dr Nakatani ní ìwé-ẹ̀rí ìṣẹ̀gun àti PhD nínú ìlera àwùjọ.
zu: UDkt Nakatani uneziqu zobudokotela nePhD kwezempilo yomphakathi.

am: ዶ/ር ራዝያ ፔንድሴ እ.ኤ.አ ከግንቦት 4 ቀን 2023 ጀምሮ የሼፍ ዲ ካቢኔ ሆና ተሹማለች።
en: Dr Razia Pendse will become the Chef de Cabinet as of 4 May 2023.
ha: Dakta Razia Pendse za ta karɓi matsayin Chef de Cabinet har zuwa 4 ga watan Mayu 2023.
sw: Dkt Razia Pendse atakuwa mkuu wa Baraza la mawaziri kuanzia tarehe 4 Mei 2023.
yo: Dr Razia Pendse máa di Chef de Cabinet láti 4 oṣù Èbìbí ọdún 2023.
zu: UDkt Razia Pendse uzoba nguChef deCabinet kusukela ngomhlaka-4 kuNhlaba 2023.

am: በዚህ ተግባር ዶ/ር ፔንድሴ የድርጅቱን ቅድሚያ የሚሰጣቸውን ተግባራት እና ተነሳሽነቶችን በማገዝ የጄኔራል ዳይሬክተሩን ጽህፈት ቤት ይመራሉ እና በአለም ጤና ድርጅት አመራር ቡድን እና በአለም ጤና ድርጅት ሶስት እርከኖች መካከል ያለውን አሰላለፍ ታረጋግጣለች።
en: In this role Dr Pendse will head the Director-General’s Office, helping to drive the Organization’s priorities and initiatives, and will ensure alignment within the WHO leadership team and across the three levels of WHO.
ha: A wannan muƙamin, Dakta Pendse zai jagoranci ofishin Darakta-Janar, wanda zai taimaka wajen fitar da fifiko da tsare-tsare na kungiyar, kuma zai tabbatar da daidaito a cikin tawagar shugabannin Hukumar WHO da kuma a cikin matakai uku na WHO.
sw: Katika jukumu hili Dk Pendse ataongoza ofisi ya mkurugenzi mkuu, akisaidia kuendeleza vipaumbele na mipango ya shirika, atahakikisha uwiano ndani ya timu ya uongozi ya WHO na katika ngazi tatu za WHO.
yo: Nínú ipò yìí Dr Pendse máa di olórí Ọ́fíísì Olùdarí-Àpapọ̀, tí yóò máa ṣe ìrànwọ́ láti darí àwọn nǹkan pàtàkì Àjọ náà àti àwọn ìpilẹ̀ṣẹ̀, yóó sì ṣe àrídájú ìdọ́gba láàrín ikọ̀ àwọn olùdarí WHO àti jákèjádò àwọn ìpele mẹ́tẹ̀ẹ̀ta WHO.
zu: Kulesisikhundla uDkt Pendse uzohola iHhovisi loMqondisi Jikelele, esiza ukuhambisa iNhlangano kokuhamba phambili nemizamo, futhi uzoqinisekisa ukuhambisana neqembu lobuholi beWHO kuwona womathathu amazinga eWHO.

am: ዶ/ር ፔንድሴ በጤናማ ህዝብ እና ተላላፊ ያልሆኑ በሽታዎች ዳይሬክተር ሆነው በአለም ጤና ድርጅት ክልላዊ ቢሮ ለደቡብ-ምስራቅ እስያ ሲያገለግሉ የቆዩ ሲሆን ቀደም ሲል የዓለም ጤና ድርጅት በስሪላንካ ተወካይ ነበሩ።
en: Dr Pendse has been serving as the Director of Healthier Populations and Noncommunicable Diseases in the WHO Regional Office for South-East Asia and was previously the WHO Representative to Sri Lanka.
ha: Dakta Pendse ya kasance Daraktan Kula da Lafiyar Jama'a da Cututtukan da ba sa yaɗuwa a Ofishin Hukumar WHO na yankin Kudu maso Gabashin Asiya kuma a baya shi ne Wakilin Hukumar WHO a Sri Lanka.
sw: Dk Pendse amekuwa mkurugenzi wa idadi ya watu wenye afya bora na magonjwa yasiyoamukiza katika ofisi ya kanda ya WHO ya Kusini Mashsriki mwa Asia na hapo awali alikuwa mwakilishi wa WHO nchini Sri Lanka.
yo: Dr Pendse ti ń ṣiṣẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bíi Olùdarí fún Àwọn Ènìyàn Tó Ní Àlàáfíà àti Àwọn Ààrùn tí kìí Ràn ní Ọ́fíísì Ẹkùn Agbègbè WHO fún Gúúsù Ìlà-oòrùn Asia tí ó sì jẹ́ Aṣojú WHO ní Sri Lanka tẹ́lẹ̀.
zu: UDkt Pendse ubesebenza njengoMqondisi weHealthier Populations and Noncommunicable Diseases kuHhovisi leSifunda leWHO eSouth-East Asia futhi wayemele iWHO eSri Lanka.

am: ዶ/ር ፔንደሴ በሕዝብ ጤና ሁለተኛ ዲግሪ እና የሕክምና ዲግሪ አላቸው።
en: Dr Pendse holds a medical degree and master's degree in public health.
ha: Dakta Pendse yana da digirin farko a ɓangaren likitanci da digirin digirgir a fannin kiwon lafiyar jama'a.
sw: Dk Pendse ana shahada ya matibabu na shahada ya uzamili katika afya ya umma.
yo: Dr Pendse ní ìwé-ẹ̀rí ìṣẹ̀gun àti ìwé-ẹ̀rí másítà nínú ìlera àwùjọ.
zu: UDkt Pendse uneziqu zobudokotela neziqu zemastazi kwezempilo yomphakathi.

am: ዶ/ር ጄሮም ሰሎሞን እ.ኤ.አ ከመጋቢት 17 ቀን 2023 ጀምሮ ለአለም አቀፍ የጤና ሽፋን፣ ተላላፊ እና ተላላፊ ያልሆኑ በሽታዎች ረዳት ዋና ዳይሬክተር ሆነው ተሹመዋል።
en: Dr Jérôme Salomon will become Assistant Director-General for Universal Health Coverage, Communicable and Noncommunicable Diseases as of 17 April 2023.
ha: Dakta JÃ©rÃ'me Salomon zai zama Mataimakin Darakta-Janar na Kula da Lafiya ta Duniya, Cututtuka masu Yaɗuwa da Marasa Yaɗuwa daga ranar 17 ga Afrilu 2023.
sw: Dkt Jerome Solomon atakuwa mkurugenzi mkuu msaidizi wa huduma ya afya kwa wote, magonjwa yanayoambukiza na yasiyoamukiza kuanzia tarehe 17 Aprili 2023.
yo: Dr Jérôme Salomon máa di Igbákejì Olùdarí-Àpapọ̀ fún Kíkárí Ìlera Lágbàyé, Ààrùn Àkóràn àti Ààrùn tí kìí Ràn láti 17 oṣù Igbe ọdún 2023.
zu: UDkt Jerome Salomon uzoba Ngumsizi waMqondisi Jikelele wezokukhavwa kweZempilo eMhlabeni, izifo okuxhunyanwa ngazo nokungaxhunyanwa ngazo kusukela ngomhlaka-17 Mbasa 2023.

am: በዚህ ተግባር ዶ/ር ሰሎሞን ኤችአይቪ፣ ሄፓታይተስ መባዛትን፣ በግብረ ሥጋ ግንኙነት የሚተላለፉ ኢንፌክሽኖች፣ ሳንባ ነቀርሳ፣ ወባ፣ ችላ የተባሉ የሞቃታማ ክልል በሽታዎች፣ የአዕምሮ ጤና፣ሥር የሰደደ የመተንፈሻ አካላት በሽታዎች እና ካንሰርን፣ የአደንዛዥ እጾች መዛባት እና ተላላፊ ያልሆኑ በሽታዎችን እንደ የልብና የደም ቧንቧ በሽታ፣ የስኳር በሽታ የመሳሰሉ ሰፋ ያሉ የቴክኒክ ፕሮግራሞችን ይቆጣጠራሉ።
en: In this role Dr Salomon will oversee a broad portfolio of technical programmes covering HIV, viral hepatitis, sexually-transmitted infections, tuberculosis, malaria, neglected tropical diseases, mental health, substance use disorders, and noncommunicable diseases such as cardiovascular disease, diabetes, chronic respiratory diseases and cancer.
ha: A wannan muƙamin, Dakta Salomon zai kula da babban fayil na shirye-shiryen fasaha wanda ya shafi cutar ƙanjamau, hepatitis viral, cututtukan da ake kamuwa da su ta hanyar jima'i, tarin fuka, zazzaɓin cizon sauro, cututtuka na wurare masu zafi da ba a kula da su, lafiyar ƙwaƙwalwa, rashin amfani da abubuwa, da cututtukan da ba a iya kamuwa da su kamar cututtukan zuciya da jijiyoyin jini, ciwon sukari, na yau da kullun, cututtuka da suka shafi numfashi da ciwon daji.
sw: Katika jukumu hili Dk Solomon atasimamia sehemu kubwa ya Programuza kiufundi zinaohusu VVU, homa ya Ini, Magonjwa ya Zinaa, kifua kikuu, Malaria, magonjwa kitropiki yaliyosahaulika, afya ya akili, matatizo ya matumizi ya dawa na magonjwa yasiyoambukiza kama vile magonjwa ya moyo na mishipa, kisukari, magonjwa sugu ya kupumua na Saratani.
yo: Nínú ipò yìí Dr Salomon máa ṣàmójútó àwọn ipò àwọn ètò ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tó fẹjú tó kárí KASA, àjàkálẹ̀ ààrùn jẹ̀dọ̀jẹ̀dọ̀, àwọn ààrùn látara ìbálòpọ̀, ikọ́fe, àìsàn ibà, àwọn ààrùn ìgbóná tí wọ́n ti patì, ìlera ọpọlọ, ààrùn ìlòkulò oògùn, àti àwọn ààrùn tí kìí ràn bíi ààrùn ọkàn, àtọgbẹ, ààrùn ọ̀fìnkì tó lágbára àti ààrùn jẹjẹrẹ.
zu: Kulesisikhundla uDkt Salamon uzobheka iphothifoliyo enkulu yezinhlelo zezobuchwepheshe ezibheka iHIV, igciwane lehephathithisi, ukuthelelana kwezifo zocansi, isifo sofuba, umalalaeveva, izifo ezidumile ezinganakiwe, ezempilo zengqondo, isifo sokusebenzisa izidakamizwa izifo okungaxhunyanwa ngazo njengezifo zenhliziyo, ushukena, izifo zondendende zokuphefumua kanye nomdlavuza.

am: ዶ/ር ሰሎሞን በፈረንሳይ ጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስቴር የጤና ጥበቃ ዋና ዳይሬክተር ሆነው ሲያገለግሉ ቆይተዋል።
en: Dr Salomon has been serving as the Director-General for Health at the Ministry of Health and Prevention of France.
ha: Dakta Salomon ya kasance babban darakta mai kula da lafiya a ma’aikatar lafiya da rigakafin ƙasar Faransa.
sw: Dk Solomon amekuwa akihudumu kama mkurugenzi mkuu wa afya katika wizara ya afya na kinga ya Ufaransa.
yo: Dr Solomon ti ń ṣiṣẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bíi Olùdarí-Àpapọ̀ fún Ìlera ní Ilé-iṣẹ́ Ìjọba tó ń rí sí Ètò Ìlera àti Ìdènà fún orílẹ̀-èdè France.
zu: UDkt Salomon ubesebenza njengoMqondisi Jikelele weZempilo kubungqongqoshe beZempilo nokuvikela eFrance.

am: ከመሾሙ በፊት የአለም ጤና ድርጅት ስራ አስፈፃሚ ቦርድ አባል የነበሩ እና በጤና ስርአት አያያዝ፣ ተላላፊ በሽታዎች እና አለም አቀፍ የህብረተሰብ ጤና ላይ ሰፊ ልምድ ያላቸው ናቸው።
en: He was a Member of the WHO Executive Board prior to his appointment and has extensive experience in health systems management, communicable diseases and international public health.
ha: Ya kasance memba a hukumar ta WHO kafin naɗin nasa, kuma yana da gogewa a fannin kula da tsarin kiwon lafiya, cututtuka masu yaɗuwa da kuma lafiyar al'ummar duniya.
sw: Alikuwa mjumbe wa Halmashauri kuu ya WHO kabla ya kuteuliwa na ana uzoefu mkubwa katika usimamizi wa mifumo ya afya, magonjwa ya kuambukiza na afya ya kimataifa ya umma.
yo: Ó jẹ́ ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ Ìgbìmọ̀ Aláṣẹ WHO ṣíwájú ìyànsípò rẹ̀ ó sì ní ìrírí tó pọ̀ nínú àmójútó àwọn ètò ìlera, àwọn ààrùn àkóràn àti ìlera àwujọ ilẹ̀-òkèèrè.
zu: Wayeyilungu leBhodi labaphathi beWHO ngaphambi kokuqokwa kwakhe futhi nesipiliyoni sakhe esikhulu ekuphathweni kwezinhlelo zempilo,izifo okuxhunyanwa ngazo nezempilo yomphakathi kumazwe angaphandle.

am: ዶ/ር ሰሎሞን የሕክምና ዲግሪ፣ በሕዝብ ጤና ማስተርስ ዲግሪ እና በኤፒዲሚዮሎጂ ፒኤችዲ አግኝተዋል።
en: Dr Salomon holds a medical degree, a master’s degree in public health and a PhD in epidemiology.
ha: Dokta Salomon yana da digiri na likitanci, digiri na biyu a fannin kula da lafiyar jama'a da kuma digiri na uku a fannin ilimin cututtuka.
sw: Dk Solomon ana shahada ya matibabu, shahada ya uzamili katika afya ya umma na shahada ya uzamivu katika magonjwa.
yo: Dr Solomon ní ìwé-ẹ̀rí ìṣẹ̀gun, ìwé-ẹ̀rí másítà nínú ìlera àwùjọ àti PhD nínú ẹ̀kọ́ nípa àjàkálẹ̀ ààrùn.
zu: UDkt Salomon uneziqu zobudokotela,izqu zemastazi kwezempilo yomphakathi kanye nePHD ku-ephidemiloji.

am: የዋና መሥሪያ ቤቱ አመራር ቡድን ነባር አባላት የስልጣንና የልምድ ደረጃ፡- ዶ/ር ሰሚራ አስማ የመረጃ፣ ትንታኔ እና ለተፅእኖ አቅርቦት ረዳት ዋና ዳይሬክተር ሆነው ይቀጥላሉ።
en: The portfolios of existing members of the headquarters leadership team: Dr Samira Asma will continue as the Assistant Director-General for Data, Analytics and Delivery for Impact.
ha: Takaddun mambobi na ƙungiyar jagoranci na hedkwatar sun haɗa da: Dr Samira Asma wacce za ta ci gaba da zama mataimakiyar Darakta-Janar kan Bayanai, Bincike da Bayarwa don Tasiri.
sw: Nyadhifa za wanachama waliopo wa timu ya uongozi ya makao makuu: Dk Samira Asma ataendelea kuwa mkurugenzi mkuu msaidizi wa Takwimu, uchanganuzi na uwasilishaji wa Athari.
yo: Àwọn ipò àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ tó ṣì wà nínú ikọ̀ olórí olú ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ni: Dr Samira Asma máa tẹ̀síwájú gẹ́gẹ́ bíi Igbákejì Olùdarí-Àpapọ̀ fún Dátà, Ìyànnàná àti Àgbékalẹ̀ fún Ipa.
zu: Lamaphothifolo amalungu akhona eqembu lobuholi ekomkhulu: uDkt Samira Asma uzoqhubeka njengoMsizi Mqondisi Jikelele weMininingo, ukuhlaziya nokulethwa kwemithelela.

am: የዶ/ር አስማ የስራ ሀላፊነት ከተባለው በላይ ሲሰፋ፣ የጤና መረጃዎች አስተማማኝ እና ተደራሽ መሆናቸውን በማረጋግጥ እና በዓለም ዙሪያ የጤና ውጤቶችን ለማሻሻል ጥቅም ላይ የሚውሉ የሶስት ቢሊዮን ግቦችን መከታተል እና ማፋጠን እና ከጤና ጋር የተገናኙ የዘላቂ ልማት ግቦች ይቆጣጠራሉ።
en: Dr Asma oversees a portfolio which ensures that health data are reliable and accessible, and are used to improve health outcomes worldwide, including tracking and accelerating progress towards the triple billion targets and the health-related Sustainable Development Goals.
ha: Dokta Asma tana kula da fayil ɗin da ke tabbatar da cewa bayanan kiwon lafiya amintattu ne kuma ana iya samun su, kuma ana amfani da su don haɓaka sakamakon kiwon lafiya a duk duniya, gami da bin diddigin ci gaba da haɓaka ci gaba zuwa buƙatun biliyan uku da maƙasudin ci gaba mai dorewa masu alaƙa da lafiya.
sw: Dkt Asma anasimamia idara ambayo inahakikisha kwamba Data ya afya ni ya kuaminika na inapatikana, na inatumiwa kuboresha matokeo ya afya Duniani kote, ikiwa ni pamoja na kufuatilia na kuharakisha maendeleo kuelekea malengo ya Bilioni tatu na malengo ya maendeleo endelevu yanayohusiana na Afya.
yo: DR Asma ń ṣàmójútó ipò kan tó ń rí i dájú pé àwọn dátà ìlera ṣe é gbáralé ó sì wà fún lílò, wọ́n sì ń lò ó láti mú àyípadà bá àbájáde ìlera jákèjádò àgbáyé, tó fi mọ́ ìtọpinpin àti mímú kí ìtẹ̀síwájú yá fún àwọn àfojúsùn bílíọ̀nù mẹ́ta àti àwọn Èròngbà Ìdàgbàsókè Alálòpẹ́ ajẹmọ́-ìlera.
zu: UDkt Asma ubheke iphothifoliyo eqinisekisa ukuthi idatha yezempilo ikhona futhi iyatholakala, futhi isetshenziswa ukwenzangcono imiphumela yezempilo emhlabeni wonke, okufaka ukulandelela nokuqhuba ukuqhubeka okubheke kokuqondiwe okungamabhiliyoni amathathu futhi okuhlobene nesempilo yeSustainable Development Goals.

am: ዶ/ር አስማ እ.ኤ.አ በ2018 የአለም ጤና ድርጅትን ከመቀላቀላቸው በፊት በዩኤስ የበሽታ መቆጣጠሪያ እና መከላከያ ማእከል (CDC) ውስጥ ከሁለት አስርት አመታት በላይ የመሪነት ቦታዎችን ይዘዋል።
en: Prior to joining WHO in 2018, Dr Asma held leadership positions at the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) for over two decades.
ha: Kafin ta fara aikin da Hukumar WHO a shekarar 2018, Dakta Asma ta riƙe muƙaman jagoranci a Cibiyar Kula da Cututtuka ta Ƙasar Amurka (CDC) na sama da shekaru ashirin.
sw: Kabla ya kujiunga na WHO mwaka 2018, Dk Asma alishikilia nyadhifa za uongozi katika vituo vya Marekani vya kudhibiti na kuzuia magonjwa (CDC) kwa zaidi ya miongo miwili.
yo: Ṣíwájú kí ó tó darapọ̀ mọ́ WHO ní ọdún 2018, Dr Asma wà ní ipò olórí kan ní Ààyè fún Ìdarí Ààrùn àti Ìdènà (CDC) ní U.S. fún ogún ọdún lé.
zu: Ngaphambi kokujoyina iWHO ngo-2018, uDkt Asma ubambe izikhundla zobuholi e-U.S. Centers for Disease Contrel and Prevention (CDC) iminyaka engaphezu kwamashumi amabili.

am: በጥርስ ቀዶ ጥገና የዶክትሬት ዲግሪ፣ በሕዝብ ጤና ሁለተኛ ዲግሪንም አግኝታለች።
en: She holds a doctorate degree in dental surgery and a master's degree in public health.
ha: Ta yi digirin digirgir a fannin aikin tiyatar haƙori da kuma digiri na biyu a fannin kiwon lafiyar jama'a.
sw: Ana shahada ya udaktari katika upasuaji wa meno na shahada ya uzamili katika afya ya umma.
yo: Ó ní ìwé-ẹ̀rí ọ̀mọ̀wé nínú iṣẹ́ abẹ eyín àti ìwé-ẹ̀rí másítà nínú ìlera àwùjọ.
zu: Uneziqu zobudokotela kwezokuhlinza amazinyo kanye neziqu kwezempilo yomphakathi.

am: ዶ/ር ብሩስ አይልዋርድ እ.ኤ.አ ከግንቦት 4 ቀን 2023 ጀምሮ የአለም አቀፍ የጤና ሽፋን የህይወት ኮርስ ክፍል ረዳት ዋና ዳይሬክተር ሆነው ተሹመዋል።
en: Dr Bruce Aylward has been appointed Assistant Director-General of the Universal Health Coverage, Life Course Division as of 4 May 2023.
ha: An nada Dakta Bruce Aylward a matsayin Mataimakin Darakta-Janar na Kula da Lafiya ta Duniya, Sashen Koyarwa da Rayuwar zamantakewa har zuwa 4 ga watan Mayun 2023.
sw: Dkt Bruce Aylward ameteuliwa kuwa mkurugenzi mkuu msaidizi wa huduma ya afya kwa wote, idara ya kozi ya maisha kuanzia tarehe 4 Mei 2023.
yo: Dr Bruce Aylward ni wọ́n ti yàn sípò gẹ́gẹ́ bíi Igbákejì Olùdarí-Àpapọ̀ fún Kíkárí Ìlera Lágbàyé, Ẹ̀ka Iṣẹ́ Títí Láéláé láti 4 oṣù Èbìbí ọdún 2023.
zu: UDkt Bruce Alyward useqokelwe ukuba nguMsizi aMqondisi Jikelele weze-Universal Health Coverage, Life Course Division kusuka ngomhlaka-4 kuNhlaba 2023.

am: ዶ/ር አይልዋርድ የአለም ጤና ድርጅት የለውጥ አጀንዳን እና የድርጅቱን የባለብዙ ኤጀንሲ የኮቪድ-19 መሳሪያዎች አፋጣኝ (ACT-A) ሀብን በመምራት ላይ ናቸው።
en: Dr Aylward has been leading WHO’s Transformation Agenda and the Organization’s work on the multi-agency Access to COVID-19 Tools Accelerator (ACT-A) Hub.
ha: Dakta Aylward ya kasance yana jagorantar Ajandar Sauye-sauye ta Hukumar WHO da kuma ayyukan Ƙungiyar kan Samar da Ma'aikatu da yawa zuwa Cibiyar Haɓaka Kayan aikin cutar COVID-19 (ACT.
sw: Dk Aylward amekuwa akiongoza ajenda ya mabadiliko ya WHO na kazi ya shirika kwenye kitovu cha wakala mbalimbali cha ufikiaji wa vifaa vya kuharakisha zana za UVIKO-19 (ACT-A).
yo: Dr Aylward ti ń darí Ètò Àyípadà WHO àti iṣẹ́ Àjọ náà lórí Ànfààní oríṣiríṣi-àjọ sí Ibùdó àwọn Amúṣiṣẹ́ Irinṣẹ́ COVID-19 (ACT-A).
zu: UDkt Aylward ubehola iTransformation Agenda yeWHO kanye nomsebenzi wenhlangano kuma-ejensi amaningi okuthola amathuluzi eCOVID-19 okuqhubeka kuhabhu (ACT-A).

am: ዶ/ር አይልዋርድ በአዲሱ የሥራ ድርሻው የድርጅቱን አጀንዳ በመንዳት የመጀመሪያ ደረጃ የጤና አገልግሎትን እንደ ማዕከላዊ ወደ ሁለንተናዊ የጤና ሽፋን ለመቀየር እንዲሁም የዓለም ጤና ድርጅት በጤና ስርዓቶች፣ በክትባት እና በስነ-ተዋልዶ፣ በእናቶች እና ህጻናት ጤና ላይ የሚሰራውን ስራ ይቆጣጠራል።
en: In his new role, Dr Aylward will drive the Organization’s agenda to transform primary health care as central to universal health coverage, as well as overseeing WHO’s work on health systems, immunization and reproductive, maternal and child health.
ha: A wannan sabon muƙamin, Dakta Aylward zai jagoranci ajandar ƙungiyar don canza tsarin kiwon lafiya a matakin farko zuwa matakin gamagari, da kuma tabbatar da tsarin kiwon lafiya na duniya, da kuma kula da ayyukan WHO kan tsarin kiwon lafiya, rigakafi da haihuwa, lafiyar mata.
sw: Ktika jukumu lake jipya, Dk Aylward ataendesha ajenda ya shirika la kubadilisha huduma ya afya ya msingi kama msingi wa huduma ya afya kwa wote, vilevile kusimamia kazi ya WHO kuhusu mifumo ya afya, chanjo na afya ya uzazi, uzazi na mtoto.
yo: Nínú ipò tuntun rẹ̀, Dr Aylward máa darí ètò Àjọ náà láti mú àyípadà bá àyípadà bá ètò ìlera alábọ́dé gẹ́gẹ́ bíi àárín gbùngbùn fún kíkárí ìlera lágbàyé, bákan náà ni ṣíṣe àmójútó iṣẹ́ WHO lórí àwọn ètò ìlera, abẹ́rẹ́ àjẹsára àti ìlera ìbímọ, ìyá àti ọmọ.
zu: Kundima yakhe, uDkt Aylward uzohambisa ajenda yeNhlangano yokuguqula ezokunakekelwa kwezempilo kokuqala njengemaphakathi lezokukhavwa kwezempilo emhlabeni kanye nokubheka umsebenzi weWHO wokusebenza kwezinhlelo zempilo, ukugoma, ukuzala, abakhulelwe kanye nezempilo yezingane.

am: ዶ/ር አይልዋርድ የሕክምና ዲግሪ እና የማስተርስ በሕዝብ ጤና ዲግሪ አላቸው።
en: Dr Aylward holds a medical degree and a master’s degree in public health.Dr Hanan Balkhy will continue as Assistant Director-General for Antimicrobial Resistance.
ha: Dakta Aylward yana da digirin likitanci da kuma digiri na biyu a fannin kiwon lafiyar jama'a. Dakta Hanan Balkhy za ta ci gaba da zama mataimakiyar Darakta-Janar ta Antimicrobial Resistance.
sw: Dkt Aylward ana shahada ya udaktari na shahada ya uzamili katika afya ya umma. Dk Balky ataendelea kuwa mkurugenzi mkuu msaidizi wa upinzani wa Antimikrobia.
yo: Dr Aylward ní ìwé-ẹ̀rí ìṣẹ̀gun àti ìwé-ẹ̀rí másítà nínú ìlera àwùjọ, Dr Hanan Balkhy máa tẹ̀síwájú gẹ́gẹ́ bíi Igbákejì Olùdarí-Àpapọ̀ fún ẹ̀yàwuuru Jáàgùn.
zu: UDkt Alyward uneziqu zobudokotela kanye nemastazi yezempilo yomphakathi. UDkt Hanan Balykhy uzoqhubeka nokuba nguMszi waMqondisi Jikelele weAntimicrobial Resistance.

am: ዶክተር ሃናን ባልኪ የፀረ-ተባይ መከላከያ ረዳት ዋና ዳይሬክተር ሆነው ይቀጥላሉ ዶ/ር ባልኪ ከምግብ እና ግብርና ድርጅት፣ ከዓለም የእንስሳት ጤና ድርጅት እና ከተባበሩት መንግስታት የአካባቢ ጥበቃ ፕሮግራም ጋር ባለ ብዙ ዘርፍ ትብብርን ጨምሮ የመድኃኒት የመቋቋም የጤና እና ኢኮኖሚያዊ ሸክሞችን ለመግታት ቴክኒካል እና ፖለቲካዊ አመራር ይሰጣል።
en: Dr Balkhy provides technical and political leadership to curb the health and economic burdens of drug resistance, including through multi-sectoral collaboration with the Food and Agriculture Organization, the World Organization for Animal Health, and the United Nations Environment Programme.
ha: Dakta Balkhy yana ba da jagoranci na fasaha da siyasa don magance matsalolin lafiya da kuma tsadar magungunan magance ta'ammuli da ƙwayoyi, ciki har da ta hanyar haɗin gwiwar ɓangarori da yawa tare da Hukumar Abinci da Aikin Noma, Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya, da Hukumar Kula da Muhalli ta Majalisar Ɗinkin Duniya.
sw: Dk Balkhy hutoa uongozi wa kiufundi na kisiasa ili kupunguza mizigo ya kiafya na kiuchumi ya ukinzani wa Dawa, ikijumuisha kupitia ushirikiano wa sekta mbalimbali na shirika la chakula na kilimo, shirika la afya ya wanyama Duniani, na mpango wa mazingira wa umoja wa mataifa.
yo: Dr Balkhy ń pèsè ìdarí ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ àti òṣèlú láti dènà àwọn ìṣòro ìlera àti ọrọ̀ ajé fún jáàgùn, tó fi mọ́ nípasẹ àjọṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú ẹlẹ́ka-jẹ̀ka pẹ̀lú Ilé-iṣẹ́ Oúnjẹ àti Iṣẹ́ Àgbẹ̀, Àjọ Àgbáyé fún Ìlera Ẹranko, àti Ètò Àwùjọ Àjọ Ìṣọ̀kan Àgbáyé.
zu: UDkt Balkhy uzonikezela ngobuchwepheshe nobuholi bezepolitiki ukubheka ezempilo nomthwalo wezomnotho ekungavumini kwesidakamizwa,okufaka ngokubambisana kwemikhakha eminingi neNhlangano yeZolimo noKudla Inhlangano yoMhlaba yezeMpilo yeZilwane kanye neUnited Nations Environment Programme.

am: ዶ/ር ባልኪ የዓለም ጤና ድርጅትን ከመቀላቀላቸው በፊት በሳዑዲ አረቢያ ብሔራዊ ጥበቃ ሚኒስቴር የኢንፌክሽን መከላከልና መቆጣጠር ዋና ዳይሬክተር ነበሩ።
en: Prior to joining WHO, Dr Balkhy was Executive Director for Infection Prevention and Control at Saudi Arabia’s Ministry of National Guard.
ha: Kafin shigarsa Hukumar WHO, Da Balkhy ya kasance Babban Darakta na Kariya da Kula da Cututtuka a Ma'aikatar Tsaro ta Ƙasar Saudi Arabiya.
sw: Kabla ya kujiunga na WHO, Dk Balkhy alikuwa mkurugenzi mtendaji wa kuzuia na kudhibiti maambukizi katika wizara ya walinzi wa kitaifa ya Saudi Arabia.
yo: Ṣíwájú kí ó dó darapọ̀ mọ́ WHO, Dr Balkhy jẹ́ Olùdarí Aláṣẹ fún Ìdènà àti Ìdarí Àkóràn ní Ilé-iṣẹ́ Ìjọba tó ń rí sí Ààbò Orílẹ̀-èdè ní orílẹ̀-èdè Saudi Arabia.
zu: Ngaphambi kokujoyina iWHO, uDkt Balkhy ubenguMqondisi omkhulu weWokuvikela ukuthelelana nokulawula eSaudi Arabia Ministry of Nationa Guard.

am: ዶ/ር ባልኪ በልጆች ተላላፊ በሽታዎች ላይ ልዩ ሙያ ያለው የሕክምና ዲግሪ አለው።
en: Dr Balkhy holds a medical degree with specialization in paediatric infectious diseases.
ha: Dakta Balkhy yana da digiri a ɓangaren likitanci tare da ƙwarewa a cututtuka masu yaɗuwa a ƙananan yara.
sw: Dk Balkhy ana shahada ya matibabu na utaalamu wa magonjwa ya kuambukiza kwa watoto.
yo: Dr Balkhy ní ìwé-ẹ̀rí ìṣẹ̀gun pẹ̀lú àmọ̀já nínú àwọn ààrùn àkóràn ìkókó.
zu: UDkt Balkhy uneziqu zobudokotela nokugxila ezifweni ezithelelanayo ezinganeni.

am: ዶ/ር ካታሪና ቦህሜ እ.ኤ.አ ከግንቦት 4 ቀን 2023 ጀምሮ ረዳት ዋና ዳይሬክተር፣ የውጭ ግንኙነት እና አስተዳደር ይሆናሉ።
en: Dr Catharina Boehme will become Assistant Director-General, External Relations and Governance as of 4 May 2023.
ha: Dakta Catharina Boehme za ta zama mataimakiyar Darakta-Janar, Harkokin Ƙetare da Jagoranci tun daga 4 ga watan Mayun 2023.
sw: Dk Catharina Boehme atakuwa mkurugenzi mkuu msaidizi, mahusiano ya kimataifa na utawala kuanzia tarehe 4 Mei 2023.
yo: Dr Catherina Boehme máa di Igbákejì Olùdarí-Àpapọ̀, Àwọn Àjọṣepọ̀ Láti Ìta àti Ìṣèjọba láti 4 oṣù Èbìbí ọdún 2023.
zu: UDkt Catharina Boehme uzoba nguMsizi kaMqondisi Jikelele weExternal Relations and Government kusukela mhlaka-4 kuNhlaba 2023.

am: በዚህ ሚና ዶ/ር ቦህሜ የአለም ጤና ድርጅትን ስትራቴጂክ ተሳትፎን በአስተዳደር ፣በሃብት ማሰባሰብ እና የአጋር ግንኙነቶችን ይመራል።
en: In this role Dr Boehme will lead WHO’s strategic engagement in the areas of governance, resource mobilization and partner relations.
ha: A wannan muƙamin, Dakta Boehme zai jagoranci dabarun Hukumar WHO a fannonin gudanar da mulki, tattara albarkatu da dangantakar abokantaka.
sw: Katika jukumu hili Dk Boehme ataongoza ushiriki wa kimkakati wa WHO katika maeneo ya utawala, uhamishaji wa rasilimali na uhusiano wa washirika.
yo: Nínú ipò tuntun yìí Dr Boehme máa léwájú ìlànà-iṣẹ́ ìbáraẹnisọ̀rọ̀ WHO ní àwọn agbègbè ìṣèjọba, ṣíṣe àkójọpọ̀ ohun èlò àti àjọṣe pẹ̀lú àwọn alájọṣepọ̀.
zu: Kulesisikhundla uDkt Boehme uzohola ukuphathwa kwamasu kweWHO ezindaweni zokuphatha,ukuhlanganisa izinsizakusebenza nobudlelwano bokubambisana.

am: የእርሷ የስራ መደብ፣ ወሳኝ የአባል ሀገራት ሂደቶችን ማጠናቀርን ያጠቃልላል፣ ለምሳሌ ስለ ወረርሽኙ ስምምነት ድርድር፣ የአለም ጤና ድርጅት ማሻሻያ እና በዘላቂ ፋይናንስ ላይ ምክሮችን መተግበር ነው።
en: Her portfolio will include critical Member States processes, such as their negotiation of a pandemic accord, the reform of WHO’s governance and the implementation of recommendations on sustainable financing.
